loans.name: Abida

texts.en:
Abida is a 39-year-old married women. She is a mother of five children. Her husband is a government employee. In addition to that, he has started a clothing business. He wants to support his family through this business as well. He purchases a variety of clothes from different areas and sells them at a profitable price in the main market.

Presently, her husband needs to purchase some clothes to sell. However, due to a lack of finances, he is facing a problem buying them. For that reason, she requested a loan from Kiva and its partner BRAC Pakistan. She is thankful to her Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to buy clothing for her husband to resell

loans.name: Ansaf

texts.en:
Ansaf, forty, is married and lives in a small house in Jenin in the West Bank. Because it’s difficult to find a job in the West Bank, her husband opened his own carpentry business fifteen year ago. He had previous experience in this field and has a strong entrepreneurial spirit.

Ansaf has taken out a 2,000 USD loan through Kiva's field partner FATEN. This loan will help her husband to buy new machinery for his shop, allowing him to work more professionally and quickly. She hopes that this loan will result in better living conditions for her family.

loans.use: o buy new machinery for his shop

loans.name: George Nkwenti

texts.en:
George is married with ten children and lives in an eighteen bedroom house in the North West Region of Cameroon. 

He has faced many challenges in some of which are sickness of his wife and the death of his parents. 

With the loan, he is going to buy a new bike, prepare the necessary documents and pay for its maintenance.The community will benefit from easy transportation to their destinations. He thinks his business will succeed because he has been doing it for long and he has many customers and he will manage the business himself.

With the profit from the business, he will be able to expand his business.  He will also buy a filling machine for motor bike repairs, also take care of his children’s education and medication.

He prefers a loan from GHAPE because it has low interest rates; a new loan can be given as soon as you finish the old one, also coupled with the fact that GHAPE offers non financial services and do proper follow up for proper used of the loan.

loans.use: to buy a motor bike, prepare documents and pay for its maintenance

loans.name: M. Ibrahim

texts.en:
M. Ibrahim, aged 40 years, is the responsible father of two sons. He has been running a small firm in which he stocked a few embroidery machines for producing embroidered dresses for many years. He takes orders from boutique keepers and clothing wholesalers, and produces embroidery on demand.

His firm is situated near his house in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. One of his brothers and a few appointed workers help him in stitching embroidery. In this way, not only is he generating a little income for his family, but is as well becoming the cause of employment. He belongs to a middle-standard family; due to low earnings, he is unable to provide a better living standard to his siblings, parents, and his own family because he divides among the workers a major portion of the income. He has to face tough times due to a low remaining amount of profits. He cannot do any other business because he is not skillful in any other profession, so he decided to expand his current enterprise.

He does not want to stitch embroidery on order because the contractors criticize and find drawbacks in his completed shipments. He wants to buy his own fine clothing and stock of various colors of thread for stitching embroidery so that he can directly sell into the market.

Therefore, M. Ibrahim has requested a Kiva loan through BRAC Pakistan, so he can buy fine clothing and stock of various colors of thread for stitching embroidery. He seems happy after receiving the loan and thanks Kiva and its field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy fine clothing and stock of various colors of thread for stitching embroidery.

loans.name: Amparo Del Socorro

texts.en:
Amparo is a 55 year old mother of two, who lives in the Antioquia capital of Medellín. Last year she decided to set up her own café so she could provide for herself and her two boys, but is looking to make her business more successful. 

With this small loan she would like to be able to improve her sales and expand her client base by improving her stock, and purchasing more drinks and snacks. 

Amparo envisions a better life for herself in which she continues to improve on her business in order that she can one day afford her own dream home.

loans.use: improving her stock, and purchasing more drinks and snacks

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a variety of clothes for reselling from her home.

loans.name: Gullu

texts.en:
Gullu is 49 years old  married with 5 kids.She is a refugee as all her  family. They live in IDP settlement. She earns money for her  family bringing up husbandry and selling their meat and wool at local bazaar. She has been working in this area for 12 years and her  monthly income is 220AZN. 

Azerbaijan people has been bringing up sheep and selling their wool from ancient times. The use their wool for sewing war jackets, blankets, gloves and etc. These thing made from sheep wool are very warm and soft. Sheep meat is used to cook such delicious dishes as kebab. People like eating kebab on holidays and parties. 

Gullu wants to expand her business. Though husbandry is a good source of income, unfortunately, her income is too low to cover life demands of her  family. She applied for 1500 AZN loan in order to buy additional husbandry (cows). She plans produce and to sell milk and dairy products.  Let’s help Gullu  to reach her aim.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Grace is 56 years old and has one child who is in school.

Grace has a dry goods business in the Philippines. Grace requested a PHP 11,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more items like foot-wear, school supplies and other ready-to-wear clothing.

Grace has been in this business for six years. In the future, Grace would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items like footwear, school supplies and other ready-to-wear clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of accessories and household supplies

loans.name: Majed

texts.en:
Majed is living in one of the poor areas in Jordan. He is a married man and father of four children.

Majed started his own business from the money he had. His business is a small mini-market that he opened after he had a good experience working in this field in one of the markets beside his work in the Ministry of Jordan. 

He is asking for the loan to get more requirements for his market and to buy what he needs and more food supplies to increase the quality of his work and get more income.

loans.use: to get more requirements for his market and to buy what he needs and more food supplies

loans.name: Amir

texts.en: Hello lenders! This is Amir, one of Ruma’s agents. Amir lives in Tasikmalaya, a city in southeastern West Java, Indonesia, located between Bandung and Purwokerto on the southerly of the two major road routes across Java. Amir is happily married, and together with his wife, they have three children. As a main source of income, Amir owns and manages a small stall that sell stationery and mobile airtime credits, and provides bill payment services for his community (like electricity, water, etc). As the business grows, Amir is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. He will use the capital to provide more mobile airtime credits and bill payment services to his community. Amir knows about the importance of your loan, which will be very useful to help him improve his business and accordingly, his community, which needs access to such services. Amir is the one who is seen in the photo. He thanks you for your kind support.

loans.use: to give his community better access to communication and financial services by selling mobile airtime credits and providing bill payment services.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a bathroom in her home which will improve access to sanitation and water.

loans.name: Amoneh

texts.en:
Amoneh is a 29-year-old married woman from Yata, a village near Hebron city.  She is a mother of two sons and one daughter.  Her husband works as a construction worker where he earns a low and unstable income due to the demand.  Amoneh started her own business two years ago, opening a barn to raise sheep.  She sells her product in the local market.

Amoneh took a USD loan from FATEN to help her to buy additional sheep to raise in her barn.  This will increase productivity and income.

Amoneh appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy more sheep for her barn.

loans.name: Ulviyya

texts.en:
Ulviyya is a 22-year-old single client in the Bilasuvar region. She never went to school because of her parents' financial situation and the war. She is IDP (internally displaced person) and lives with her family. They are living in hard conditions, and because of that, she is working every day without rest.

Ulviyya works growing fruits and vegetables. She learned this from her father. This has allowed her to move her family ahead. Ulviyya's day starts at 6:00 a.m. because she wakes up very early to milk a cow. 

. She applied for 1500AZN loan in order to buy new fertilizers and garden tools. Please support Ulviyya

loans.use: to buy new fertilizers and garden tools

loans.name: Shakeela

texts.en:
Shakeela, a mother of three sons and two daughters, is 48 and lives in an area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband is a very hardworking man. He owns a general store in his hometown; he sells different kinds of products of daily use.Earlier, his father was running this store but due to his old age, her husband looks after all the matters. He purchases the inventory in large quantity from a nearby store and sells it in his general store. Now he wants to offer more types of products to his customers but he does not have a sufficient amount of money to buy these additional products.

Therefore, Shakeela requested a loan so that he could buy his desired products to sell. He will make some savings with the profit and hopes that in the future, he will prepare all the sweets by himself.

Shakeela pays thanks to Kiva and field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy more inventory for her husband's general store.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 29-year-old married man from Dier Al-Balah City in the Gaza strip. He lives with his wife and child in a small, humble house. Ahmad works in the public sector, where he earns a low income that barely covers all the family's needs. Ahmed decided to buy a rickshaw for distributing goods in the city. It is a good business and provides a good income. 

Ahmad took a loan from Palestine for Credit & Development. This loan will help him to buy a new rickshaw to transport goods between shops, to increase his income. Ahmad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a rickshaw for distributing goods in the city.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw.

loans.name: Huseyn

texts.en:
Huseyn is 37 years old. He lives in an IDP [internally displaced persons] settlement with his wife and two sons. His wife is a housekeeper and educates children. Huseyn has been earning money for the family working as a butcher for 16 years. People go to him when they need to cut cow or sheep meat properly. He earns 200 Azerbaijani manats (AZN) monthly from this. 

Butchery is one of the oldest and most prevalent professions. Azerbaijan cuisine is very famous and various. There are a lot of different delicious dishes from meat. Some of the recipes require meat to be specially cut. For these cases, most people refer to butchers. Huseyn is the most famous butcher in his region. Many restaurant chefs know him and prefer his butchery.

Being IDP makes Huseyn’s family’s life hard. He can’t provide his children education and isn’t able to cover demands. He applied for a 1200 AZN loan in order to buy new butchery tools and new husbandry for his small business. He wants to buy new butchery tables and make his butchery shop wider.

loans.use: to buy new butchery tools and new husbandry for his small business

loans.name: Thắm

texts.en:
Thắm is 50 years old and married. She lives in Quang Xuong district, a semi-urban town in Thanh Hoa province. For the past 10 years, Thắm has worked raising poultry. Her family’s income is low and her job is unstable. Thắm’s family has a two-hole latrine. One of her most critical difficulties is that her latrine is not hygienic.

Thắm is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet. This will be Thắm’s first loan with the Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution. In the future, Thắm hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase many kinds of vegetables such as tomatoes, onions, eggplants, chilies, etc.

loans.name: Phượng

texts.en:
Mrs Phượng is 60 years old and she is married. Phượng lives in Quang Xuong district, a semi-urban town in Thanh Hoá province.
 
Phượng has worked in agriculture raising poultry for more than 10 years. Her family is a low-income household in village; moreover this job is unstable.

Her family has a 2-hole latrine. One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is the latrine is not hygienic. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipments to build a toilet.

This is Phượng's first loan with Thanh Hoá Microfinance Institution.

With her business profit, Phượng hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipments to build toilet.

loans.name: N2 T3 Qvinh - Solidarity Group

texts.en:
Mrs Thoa is 51 years old and she is married. She has worked in agriculture raising poultry for five years.

Thoa lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in the village, moreover, the market need is low in this region.
The main hardship that Thoa faces is lack of capital. In 2014, Thoa joined Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution to improve her  business. Thoa has successfully repaid 1 loan from Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution. She is a reputable person in the community. She is group leader of "N2 T3 QVinh - Solidarity group" and requesting a loan to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in future.

Along with her business profit, Thoa hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in future

loans.name: Eunice

texts.en:
Eunice is a single woman who has three children. She lives at her rental house that has electricity, not piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are her rent and electricity bill.

She has operated a shoe selling business for the past year, selling to the ladies in the nearby town and at the market. With the loan, she wants to purchase more shoes for resale in her business. She decided to join Yehu to access a loan and boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase more shoes for resale in her business

loans.name: Rani Group

texts.en:
Rani is the age of 32 and a mother of four children living with her spouse and children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband is a green grocer by profession, and he has sold fresh vegetables at a shop in a nearby town for many years. Her husband offers seasonal and fresh vegetables to his customers. He has been feeding his family through the generated income from this vegetable shop.

Nowadays, the needs of his family have increased suddenly and he does not have other sources to cope with these needs. So he decided to expand his current business. He wants to increase his stock on a daily basis so that he can maximize his sales of the vegetables. So, Rani demanded a loan so her husband will be able to buy more fresh vegetables to sell.

Rani is very thankful to Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy fresh and seasonal vegetables for reselling purposes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more tools and products to produce more products from the coffee and expand his work

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy and build a bathroom in their home for the improvement of access to sanitation and a water source

loans.name: Magno

texts.en: Magno has owned a small trucking business in Elizabeth, New Jersey for over five years. A friendly, jovial man, he loves meeting new people on the road, and through his work he has been able to see many parts of his home state of New Jersey, along with neighboring states along the east coast. He receives goods of all kinds from the Newark port and distributes them throughout New Jersey, New York, and other eastern states. He is looking to expand his reach in the NJ area and would like to use this $10,000 loan to purchase a second truck for his business.

loans.use: to purchase a truck for his trucking company.

loans.name: Nhóm 5 Thôn 3 Tn-Quảng Vinh Group

texts.en:
Mrs Hải is 50 years old and she is married. She has worked in agriculture raising poultry for more than 10 years.

Hải lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in the village, moreover, the market need is low in this region. 

The main hardship that Hải faces is lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in future.

In 2014, Hải joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her  business. Hải has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution.

Along with her business profit, Hải hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in future

loans.name: Candelaria

texts.en: Candelaria is a responsible mother and dedicated in her work as retailer of various plastic products. This is her only source of income and she is very grateful for her life and the ability to be independent. She retails brushes, slippers, plastic kitchen wares, etc. This business has given her the opportunity to work and survive. She applied for a loan of 20,000 PHP in order to expand her business. She will buy additional plastic wares and plastic kitchen wares that are in demand. This will allow her generate more income and be able to cater to various kitchen and household needs. Candelaria will now be able to pay for tuition and graduation costs of her child.

loans.use: buy additional plastic wares and plastic kitchen wares that are in demand

loans.name: Ma. Elvie

texts.en:
Ma. Elvie is engaged in running a sari-sari store store. She has been operating her business for 5 years and earns a monthly net income of 5,000 PHP.

Ma. Elvie is 46 years old, married and has 2 school-aged kids. She is from the village of Siare, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte. Ma. Elvie joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities.

Recently, Ma. Elvie expanded her business and engaged in fishing activities. She is taking a loan from PMPC to buy fishing equipment such as hooks & nylon nets.

loans.use: to buy fishing equipment such as hooks & nylon nets.

loans.name: N1 T3Quảng Vinh - I Love Chicken Group

texts.en:
Thoa is 36 years old and she is married. She lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. She has worked in agriculture, raising poultry for more than 10 years. Her family is a low-income household in the village; moreover the market need is low in this region. The main hardship that Thoa faces is lack of capital. In 2014, Thoa joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her business. She has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution. She is a reputable person in the community. She is group leader of "N1 T3Quảng Vinh - I love chicken" solidarity group now.
 She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in future. With her business profit, Thoa hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in future

loans.name: Bogenvil Group

texts.en:
Bogenvil is a group consists with 6 members and led by Noni (who is standing in the middle) a 53 year old woman. From the marriage to Yusuf, a 60 year old man, they have 10 children. 
Every morning Noni and Yusuf buy vegetable directly from the farmer with the lower price and sell them at a local market; it is located 1 km from their house. Noni usually operates the business at 7am to 12pm every day.  
In order to make more income she has planned to sell meat and other kind of vegetables. To make her plan comes true she needs more money to do so. She was told by an Account Officer about TLM group loan product for people who have small business like her. 5 women were interested to join this loan program when she shared it to them. She then formed the Bogenvil group and requested a loan totaling of IDR 10,500,000. Same as Noni, 5 women would like to use their parts for own businesses. They hope Kiva – TLM will support them for their better business

loans.use: to purchase meat and other various vegetables to be resold.

loans.name: Ana May

texts.en:
Ana May is a married woman with one child. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Ana May is 31 years old and her child is in school.

Ana May has a fishing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 14,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy a new engine for her fishing boat.

Ana May has been in this business for four years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy a new engine for her fishing boat.

loans.name: Suhair

texts.en:
Suhair is a young married woman, and mother of two children.  She is 27 years old and lives in a sector in Jordan called Salt.

Suhair`s husband is working in the army, with a low income and because she is a very helpful woman and wants to provide a good life and education for her children.  So she decided to rent a store under her house and start selling clothes for women and children in it. 

She is running her business by herself and it is working well, so now she applying for a loan to help her expand her work and buy more clothes," abayas " and added new styles of clothes to her store, to increase her income and be able to provide a good living for her kids.

loans.use: To buy new clothes and 'abayas' that are requested by customers

loans.name: Juan Camilo

texts.es:
Juan, es un joven de 27 años de edad que desde hace algún tiempo se ha dedicado a diversas actividades laborales pero siempre con un deseo en su mente que era el incursionar en el área comercial, fue así como desde inicios del año 2015, monto su negocio ofreciendo accesorios para peceras y peces, con el cual ha tenido gran acogida durante el tiempo que lleva de funcionamiento. 
Trabaja solo durante 6 horas todos los días.

Juan se caracteriza por ser un hombre emprendedor, amable, con visión y muchas ganas de salir adelante, es por esta razón que se anima a solicitar un crédito, para invertirlo en la compra de elementos como accesorios, peces, motores de pecera, peceras, entre otros, con el fin de darle una mejor imagen al negocio, que logre atraer más clientes y así ofrecerles una variedad de productos que satisfagan las necesidades y gustos de todos los que visiten el negocio. 

De esta manera logrará obtener ingresos para continuar aportando a la economía de su hogar y ahorrar para montar varias sucursales de su negocio y así tendrá un futuro más próspero, donde podrá mejorar notoriamente su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Juan, a young 27 year old man, has been engaged in various jobs for some time, but has always had the desire in his mind to go into business. That’s how, in early 2015, he set up his business selling fish and aquarium accessories, which has been very warmly received since going into operation.  Juan works only six hours a day.

Juan characterizes himself as a friendly, enterprising man with a vison and a great desire to succeed. For this reason, he was inspired to apply for a loan to invest in the purchase of items such as accessories, fish, aquarium motors, aquariums, and others.  His goal is to improve the image of his business, attract more customers, and thus offer them a variety of products that will meet the needs and tastes of all who visit the business.  

In this way, he will earn income to continue supporting his household and save money to open several branches of his business and thus, he will have a more prosperous future, which will enable him to notably improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase items such as accessories, fish, aquarium motors, aquariums, and others.

loans.name: Madina

texts.en:
Madina lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with 5 children and all go to school. She has no additional family members. 

She operates a secretarial bureau at the market on a retail basis. She works for seven days a week and has been in business for several years. 

She has requested for a loan from MCDT – SACC0 to buy boxes of reams of papers,staples,toner cartridges. Her major challenge includes power shortages which hinders their work. Her goal and aspirations is to buy a fast processing computer. She lives in rented house and the family has access to piped water and electricity. Her major expenses include food and school fees.

loans.use: To buy boxes of reams of paper, staples, toner for her secretarial services and office supplies shop

loans.name: Nena

texts.en:
Nena is married and she works hard to support her family.

She has a passenger boat business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. 

Nena is borrowing PHP 49,000 through NWTF in order to buy raw materials for repair her passenger boat.

Nena has been sustaining her business activities through her past 19 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. 

She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for repair her passenger boat.

loans.name: Armen

texts.en:
Armen pleased with his first Kiva deal; he greatly hopes that he will have chance to cooperate once more. 

Armen is 60 years now and he lives with his nice wife. Armen is happy since he is already grandfather of a very pretty and beautiful small girl, and as he says his every free minute he hurries to be with her, as the child makes him feel healthy, strong and unbelievably happy. 

Armen graduated from Yerevan State Polytechnic Institute, and now he works at the college now. 

Since Armen has some health problems connected with his heart he has to be always careful, to have all the medicines on time and also to pass some medical examinations from time to time. 

Now this loan Armen again needs in order to have a medical exam and make clear that everything is under control.

loans.use: to have a medical exam and make clear that everything is under control

loans.name: Keriman

texts.en:
Keriman is married and a mother of two.  She is making a contribution to the family budget by making dough products, Turkish raviolis and tomato pastes.  With the help of her first loan she bought flour, butter, oil, eggs and meat.  She sold her products and expanded her business.  

With the help of this second loan she is planning to make more money.

Translated from Turkish by Maya staff
Keriman hanım evli iki çocuk annesi.  Gözleme, mantı, salça yaparak aile ekonomisine katkı sağlıyor.  Kullandığı ilk mikro kredi ile un, yağ, yumurta, et alarak mantı, salça, gözleme üreterek ve satarak işlerini geliştirdi.  İkinci kullandığı mikro kredi ile de malzeme alıp daha çok para kazanmayı hedefliyor.

loans.use: to buy ravioli, pancakes and sauces for construction flour, butter, oil, eggs and meat

loans.name: Hrant

texts.en:
Hrant, with his wife, lives in Tsovagyugh village of Gegharkunik region. He is a framer with great skills in this field. Hrant has cows, calves, a heifer, bulls, lambs, sheep, a horse and chickens. His farm has milk, macun (a national dairy product), cheese, meat and eggs. Hrant with his wife sells locally to their neighbors and also to re-sellers.

Land cultivation is also some source of income for Hrant as he manages to have good harvest of potatoes, cucumbers, tomatoes, peppers, cabbage and greens. As he mentions, his farm’s enlargement will make the income from it more as well as the work about it, but Hrant is ready and he asks for a loan of 700,000 Armenian drams for the purchase of two calves, potato seedlings, diesel fuel and also some fodder for his farm cattle.

loans.use: to purchase two calves, potato seedlings, diesel fuel and also some fodder for his farm cattle

loans.name: Srey Oun's Group

texts.en:
A 33-year-old mother of three children, with two among them  in school while the other one is too young to attend school, Srey Oun is a rural villager living in Mondulkiri province. Growing cashew nuts and cassava farming are the sources of her family’s income for five years and it earns her about 29,700KHR per day. 

Due to having not enough funds to do farming, she is now leading a group to take a new Kiva loan via VisionFund. This is the second loan for Srey Oun and the previous loan helps her to have better living conditions and the ability to send her children to school. 

As a group leader, she is willing to take this loan to buy cashew seeds for farming. She believed that this loan would help her to earn more money and ability to keep sending her children in school.

loans.use: to buy cashew seeds for farming and be able to send her children to school

loans.name: Sakim

texts.en:
A local resident living in Kampong Cham province’s Cheung Prey district, Sakim is 50-year-old and he is a father of five children, only two of them are in school. For his living, he does rice farming and he works on other farm for a fee for thirty-two years. His daily income is about 13USD per day, but he is able to save around 8USD each day after offsetting his family expending. 

The low price of his rice yields is the main challenge for him. This is his first loan cycle; Sakim has never been with VisionFund before. He will use his entire loan to buy fertilizer, rice seed and pay for plowing fees for his farmland. He hopes that his farming will gain high yields so he will has enough ability to keep sending his children to school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, rice seed and pay for plowing fees for his farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Chhoni

texts.en:
An old woman living in Kampong Cham province, Chhoni is 58 years old and a mother of seven children. She earns income to support her family by growing rice on one hectare and cassava on two hectares. She also works for others for a fee to earn more income. She has run her business for ages, and she earns about 33,900KHR per day from it.

This is Chhoni's third cycle with Kiva partner VisionFund, and she has successfully repaid her past loans completely. She will use her loan to buy fertilizer to support her cassava farm. She hopes that her yields will be higher than last year.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to support her cassava farm

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy and build a bathroom at her home to improve her family's access to sanitation and water sources.

loans.name: Susanna

texts.en:
Susanna is from the village of Tsovagyugh in the Gegharkunik region and decided to have her first loan with Kiva and Nor Horizon. 

She is a framer since her very young age and with the help of her husband and her son, she manages farming perfectly. In the farm she has cows, calves, bulls and sheep. Together with her husband, Susanna sells meat from her farm to the city butchers. She also sells milk and great range of dairy-products. 

On her plot of land, Susanna cultivates potatoes, tomatoes and cucumber.   With this deal Susanna wants to make the purchase of potato seedlings, fertilizer and diesel fuel and also fodder for her farm cattle.

loans.use: purchase potato seedlings, fertilizer and diesel fuel and also fodder for her farm cattle

loans.name: Malagamafaleupolu

texts.en: Malagamafaleupolu is a 35-year-old mother with five children. She runs a business selling vegetables (cabbage, eggplant, cucumbers) in her community to earn a living. Malagamafaleupolu requested a loan to buy vegetable seeds, chemicals, a wheelbarrow, water tank, rake, shovel, hand gloves and safety boots to assist her to run the business. She hopes to expand her business by using her profit. She became a member of SPBD in 2009.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seeds, chemicals, a wheelbarrow, water tank, rake, shovel, hand gloves and safety boots.

loans.name: Laura Melissa

texts.es:
Laura, con 19 años de edad, es soltera y madre de 1 hija de 5 meses de edad. Se caracteriza por ser una mujer muy responsable y trabajadora, un visionaria y buena negociante. 

Se dedica a trabajar como comerciante, vendiendo ropa, desde hace unos meses tiene su propio negocio.  

Ha sabido superar tiempos difíciles en el comercio y sueña con comprarse su casa propia y tener un negocio que perdure en el tiempo; es por ello que Laura acudió a solicitar un préstamo, el cual utilizará para comprar surtido e inventario de calzado y ropa. 
Laura es una joven muy organizada aunque ha tenido que enfrentar la competencia comercial del sector.  

La suma de todos sus esfuerzos le brindan a toda su familia una calidad de vida excelente.
texts.en: Laura is 19 years old, and is the single mother of a five-month-old daughter. She is a responsible and hard-working woman, a visionary, and a good businesswoman. She works selling clothing, and has had her own business for a few months. She has been able to overcome difficult times in her business, and dreams of buying her own house and having a business that will last. For this reason she is requesting a loan, which she will use to buy shoes and clothing to supply her business. Laura is very well organized, even though she has had to contend with a lot of competition in this sector. She uses all of her efforts to provide her whole family with an excellent quality of life.

loans.use: request a loan, which she will use to buy shoes and clothing to supply her business.

loans.name: Geraldyn

texts.es:
Geraldyn es una mujer solidaria de 19 años de edad que busca a través del Micro-crédito una solución para tener una mejor entrada de dinero suficiente para sostenerse. 

Tiene un almacén en el que vende ropa, bolsos y accesorios para dama y cosméticos; atiende a sus clientes siempre con un excelente servicio pues sabe que de estos depende la sostenibilidad de su negocio.
Trabaja 5 días a la semana durante 7 horas.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de surtido de elementos de uso personal para diversificar su oferta, pues desea aumentar su capacidad de inventario y así poder afrontar su principal dificultad que es la falta de capital.
texts.en:
Geraldyn is a caring 19 year old woman who, through the micro-loan, is looking for a solution in order to have a better income that is enough to support herself.

She has a store where she sells clothes, purses, and accessories for women and also cosmetics. She always attends to her customers with excellent customer service because she knows that the sustainability of her business depends on them. She works 5 days a week for 7 hours.

She is requesting a loan to buy an assortment of items of personal use in order to diversify her supply. She wishes to increase her inventory capacity and confront her main difficulty, which is the lack of capital.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of items of personal use in order to diversify her supply, since she wishes to increase her inventory capacity

loans.name: Heyam

texts.en:
Heyam is 55 years old and lives in sector in Jordan called Marka.   She is a married woman and mother of four sons and two daughters. 
Her husband is working with a low income. Heyam thought to help her husband with the household expenses and started selling household supplies at her home. 

Now she wants to expand her business because of the high cost of living, therefore Heyam asked for a loan to buy new products to sell, as she wants to increase her income to improve the standard of living for her children.

loans.use: to buy new products to sell and the items she needs, to be able to increase her sales.

loans.name: Petesa

texts.en:
Petesa is 48 years old and married with 4 children. She runs a small business selling soup, chicken, and chips in her community and has been doing this for 4 years. 

Petesa has requested a loan to buy shopping bags, flour, a cooking pot, cooking oil, a box of chicken etc for her business. She joined SPBD in 2010 to gain access to capital. 

With her earnings, Petesa will save money to extend her business.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her food business.

loans.name: Tusi

texts.en:
Tusi is 58 years old and single with 3 children. She owns and operates a small store, selling items such as snacks, noodles, tinned fish, chicken, and sausages.  She has been doing this for 3 years.

Tusi needs a loan to buy a display cooler, a freezer, shopping bags, toiletries, frozen foods, etc. She hopes to use her profits to expand her business. She became a member of SPBD in June 2015 to gain access to capital.

loans.use: to buy a display cooler, a freezer, shopping bags, toiletries, frozen foods,

loans.name: Daed

texts.en:
Daed is 41 years old and lives in Madaba,  She is married without children. She wants to live a comfortable life with her husband.

All that depends on the financial situation for her and her husband, so she has started cooking food and making sweets in her house.  Plus she is making pickles.  She is selling her products to her neighbors and to women who are working, but lately her husband is facing financial problems, because of the rise of the cost of living, therefore she decided to expand her work to increase her income.

Daed needs your support.  Because of this, she has asked for a loan to help her buy more products and supplies to help her raise the quality of work and her prepared items to sell.  That will help her be able to support her husband more and increase her profits.

loans.use: to help her buy more products and supplies, to help her raise the quality of her home cooked products for sale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for top dressing her crops for a better harvest for family use and to sell the surplus produce to clients in the market.

loans.name: Majedah

texts.en:
Majedah, a 29-year-old married mother of one living in Southern Ghour, describes herself as a hard worker. For two years she has been operating a retail business selling household supplies and cleaning materials. Her enterprise is located at her home, and her biggest challenge is a lack of finances. 

Majedah will use this loan to buy more inventories of household supplies and cleaning materials to increase her income. She hopes that in the future she and her family will have a better life.

loans.use: to buy more inventories of household supplies and cleaning materials

loans.name: Maria Ernestina

texts.es:
María, de 53 años de edad, nunca fue a estudiar, no sabe leer ni escribir, está acompañada, tuvo 3 hijos pero ninguno vive con ella, ella solo vive con su pareja el cual se dedica a la agricultura.

María, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace más de 30 años, sus padres fueron los que le enseñaron esta labor y ahora trabaja la tierra todos los días por las mañanas juntamente con su pareja.

María, necesita el crédito para comprar 2 sacos de abono sulfato, dos de abono formula e insecticidas para sus cultivos.

María, sueña con obtener una gran cosecha y poder vender sus granos cuando sea el momento indicado; también sueña con que su hija regrese a vivir con ella nuevamente.
texts.en: Maria, 53, never went to school and doesn’t know how to read or write.  She is in a common-law relationship, and has three children, but none live with her.  She lives only with her partner, who is engaged in farming.  Maria has been engaged in farming for over thirty years; her parents taught her this trade, and now she works the land every morning together with her partner.  Maria needs the loan to purchase two sacks of sulphate fertilizer, two sacks of fertilizer formula, and insecticides for her crops.  Maria dreams of obtaining a large harvest and being able to sell her grains when the time is right.  She also dreams of her daughter coming back to live with her again.

loans.use: to purchase two sacks of sulphate fertilizer, two sacks of fertilizer formula, and insecticides for her crops.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia is taken a loan off $800 to repair her house. She is married and she has four children. Lucia started construction of her house, but she was not able to finish because of a lack of money to buy materials such as cement, stone, sand, and others. 

Now she is requesting a loan from Tuba Rai Metin to help her finish off her house.

loans.use: to buy cement, stone, sand, and other items

loans.name: Antoneta

texts.en: Antoneta lives in Atsabe. She is married and her husband works in agriculture. She has been involved in business activities since 2012, when she started with her own working capital of USD 250. She has a kiosk in her house. She is taking this loan from Tuba Rai Metin to buy additional supplies including candy, sugar, milk, aqua, noodles, cigarettes, biscuits, candles, gambling cards, soft drinks, and other things to sell. She is happy because with the loan from Tuba Rai Metin, she can expand her business in the future and her income can increase. Antoneta also has animals in her house like pigs, horse, and chickens.

loans.use: To buy candy, sugar, milk, aqua, noodles, cigarettes, biscuits, candles, gambling cards, soft drinks, and other things to sell.

loans.name: Mireille

texts.en: Mireille is a 26 year-old Lebanese married mother of one child living with her husband and his family. Her husband and his father are the main income sources in the family. And as for Mireille, she works as a teacher at the local school with the aim to provide additional support for her family. Mireille hopes to help her child with his education. For that reason, she wants to borrow from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l to pay the first installment of the study fees.  She will be more than happy to see him graduating and achieving his master’s degree. In the future, she plans to take out new Kiva loans and keep on covering his study fees.

loans.use: to pay the first installment of her child's study fees

loans.name: Julia Matilde

texts.es:
Julia inicio la venta de variedades específicamente ropa, hace meses atrás, actividad aprendida gracias a una amiga, buscó esta actividad como una alternativa de generar dinero y como mujer pujante y emprendedora busca el sustento para su hogar conformado por sus dos hijos.

Debido al costo de vida tan alto, Julia se ve en la necesidad de generar un mayor volumen de ingresos, es por este motivo que necesita un apoyo económico que la ayude a mejorar la variedad de productos que exhibe y que diariamente ofrece a sus clientes. 
Trabaja sola todos los días durante 4 horas.

Solicita un crédito para la compra calzado y ropa para añadirlos a su portafolio de productos de uso personal.

Su principal sueño es poder convertirse en la propietaria de un gran almacén con gran variedad de productos y sabe que está por buen camino de la mano de la Corporación Interactuar.
texts.en: Julia began selling a variety of products, specifically clothing, a few months ago. She learned this activity from a friend, and saw it as a way to earn money. As an energetic and enterprising woman, she was looking for a way to support her household, which is made up of her two children.  Because the cost of living is so high, Julia saw the need to earn more income. For this reason she needs financial support to improve the variety of products that she offers daily to her customers. She works alone, for 4 hours every day. She is requesting a loan to buy shoes and clothing to add to her portfolio of products for personal use. Her main dream is to become the owner of a large store with a great variety of products. She knows that she is in on the right track working with Interactuar.

loans.use: to request a loan to buy shoes and clothing to add to her portfolio of products for personal use.

loans.name: Silvia Esther

texts.es:
Silvia es una mujer de 58 años de edad, que desde hace 3 años comenzó a trabajar en diferentes actividades, actualmente tiene una tienda de abarrotes que un familiar le cedió para que la trabajara y generara ingresos para sustentar los gastos del hogar.

Este negocio lo atiende todos los días de 7 am a 9 pm y, a pesar de la competencia que existe en el sector, ha obtenido buenos resultados, generando ingresos suficientes para que a sus hijos no les haga falta nada.

El crédito que solicita con la Corporación Interactuar es un apoyo para comprar surtido al por mayor como mecato, lácteos, galletería, granos, entre otros, esto le permitirá ofrecer mayor variedad de productos para satisfacer las necesidades inmediatas de sus clientes, aumentando las ventas e ingresos que recibe por su labor.

Silvia, con su espíritu de superación y las ganas de salir adelante con su familia, la impulsan a seguir luchando y avanzar para cumplir el sueño de adquirir una casa propia, en la que pueda disfrutar una mejor calidad de vida en compañía de su familia y brindar una buena educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Silvia is a 58 year old woman. Three years ago she started to work in different businesses. Currently she has a grocery store that a family member gave her to work and generate income to sustain the household expenses. She runs this business every day of the week, from 7 am until 9 pm and in spite of the competition in the area she has had good results. She generates enough money so her children don't go without.

The loan that she is requesting from the Corporación Interactuar is help to buy stock wholesale like pastries, milk products, biscuits and grains amongst others which will allow her to have a greater variety of products. This will satisfy the immediate needs of her clients increasing her sales and the income she gets for her labor.

Silvia with her spirit of excelling and desire to get ahead with her family, pushes her to continue to strive and advance to achieving her dream of acquiring her own house where she can enjoy a higher quality of living in the company of her family and provide good education for her children.

loans.use: to buy stock wholesale like pastries, milk products, biscuits and grains amongst others which will allow her to have a greater variety of products.

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet is aged 34 years and she supports five children. She has been a farmer for the last four years and the business earns her KES 10,000 per month.

She has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from Vision Fund Kenya to purchase fertilizers for top dressing her crops for a better harvest for family use and to sell the surplus produce to clients in the market. 


She plans to use the earned profits to purchase a dairy cow for milk production and educate her children. Her hope is to be financially stable and expand her agricultural sector business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for top dressing her crops for a better harvest for family use and to sell the surplus produce to clients in the market.

loans.name: Raghda

texts.en:
Raghda is a 36-year-old married woman with four children. Because her children are growing, she  wanted to help her husband in meeting both  household  and education expenses. She therefore started a simple project and began selling children`s clothes from her home.

In order to meet her needs and provide greater help to her family, Raghda wants to increase her income by selling women`s clothes  She has thus requested this loan to help her buy more clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell

loans.name: Somaya

texts.en:
Somaya is 36 years old lives with her husband and her two children in one of the poor areas of Jordan; Somaya is a conservative woman and asked her husband to take her place in the photo. Her family is involved in agricultural activities. In particular, Somaya owns a small plot of agricultural land where she grows thyme and sells the harvested produce locally.
Somaya decided expand and develop her business and asked for a loan. 
With the received credit she will purchase more tools and supplies and manure to help her farm more thyme to increase her production and raise the quality of her work. This will increase her income and she will be able to increase her trading business gradually in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more tools and supplies and manure for her thyme farm.

loans.name: Fransica

texts.en:
Fransica is a widow with seven children and lives in a five-bedroom house in the North West Region of Cameroon. She has faced so many challenges in her life among which are the death of her husband, the death of her child, and sickness. With her loan she will buy bags of beans, Irish potatoes, garri, carrots and firewood.

Fransica holds a positive view of succeeding in this because she has been doing it for a long time and she has many customers to sell to.

This loan will help the community in that they will not go long distances to buy what they need and she will sell to them cheaper than in the market. 

With the profit from this loan, Fransica will expand her business, pay her children's school fees and improve the living standard of her family. She prefers a loan from GHAPE because of its low interest rates, convenient repayment time, training obtained before disbursement, and the follow-up for proper utilization.

loans.use: to buy bags of beans, Irish potatoes, garri, carrots, firewood and soap

loans.name: Noor

texts.en:
Noor is 32 years old and lives in a sector in Jordan called Hashmeyeh; she is a very helpful woman.

After she felt that her husband was facing financial problems, Noor decided to help him and start her own business in her home to help him with the household expenses to live a good life with her small family.

She started to sell clothes with a low quantity of products, and she started to feel that she is a productive woman and she can do something for her community, therefore she is thinking to expand and develop her work. She is applying for a loan to help her buy a larger number of clothes to increase her sales and increase her profits.

loans.use: To buy more clothes and add new kinds of clothes to increase her sales

loans.name: Zainab

texts.en:
Zainab is an amazing and caring mother of one child, She is 33 years old lives in Salt.

Zainab is working hard to insure a good life for her child and that all needs are met.
Zainab's husband is working as a security man in one of the private universities and is earning a low income so he is unable to cover all the needs of his family. Because of that, Zainab wants to help him in any way she can. Because she is a very productive and ambitious woman, she used her talents to start her sewing business.
She has talents that she learned from her mother when she was a child, She knows how to sew clothes and she has used all her talent to start her business one year ago.
Now she wants to expand her business and buy what she needs to increase the quality of her work. She applied for a loan to buy more fabric and yarn and and more tools which will help her to increase the quality of her work.

loans.use: to buy more fabric and yarn and tools to increase the quality of her work

loans.name: Martha Diana

texts.es:
Gracias a la perseverancia y coraje de Martha es que su hogar puede tener una vida digna.

Ella prepara y vende comidas rápidas en el municipio de Caldas, actividad que emprendió con el afán de buscar nuevos ingresos para el sostenimiento de su familia.

Su esposo y sus 3 hijos son la mayor motivación que tiene para trabajar diariamente y esforzarse para ser cada día mejor.

Trabaja sola durante 8 horas todos los días.

Ella espera poder impulsar su negocio con la compra insumos y materia prima, este impulso se lo pueden dar la Corporación Interactuar y los prestamistas de Kiva.
Con estos elementos ella podrá tener sus alimentos disponibles para sus clientes en todo momento.

Su mayor sueño es poder tener un restaurante en la misma zona para no perder a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Thanks to Martha's perseverance and courage her household can live a dignified life. She prepares and sells fast food in the municipality of Caldas. She started the business from the desire to find new income to support her family.

Her husband and her three sons are her main motivation for her to work hard every day and make the effort to improve each day. She works 8 hours only every day. She hopes to be able to boost her business with the purchase of supplies and raw material.

This stimulus can be provided her by the Corporación Interactuar and the Kiva lenders. With these things she can have her foods ready for her clients at any time. Her main dream is to have a restaurant in the same area so as not to lose her clients.

loans.use: to boost her food business buying supplies and raw materials.

loans.name: Ratbeh

texts.en:
Ratbeh is a woman with great ideas and a creative mind. She is always looking for activities that can improve the family income.

She bought a sewing machine and trained on it until she became a professional. She started to make clothes and some products and sell them, which helped her to cover some of the household expenses. She is 53 years old and all her batteries were charged to take on the new challenges that life has prepared for her, to provide a good life to her children.

Ratbeh is requesting financial help to buy more fabrics and yarns and to invest in setting up her business and attracting clients so that she can create a positive impact on her earnings. Her dream is to have a big tailoring business that provides a good income and creates jobs for women who need jobs to help their families.

loans.use: to buy more fabrics and yarns and to invest in setting up her business and attracting clients

loans.name: Fayza's Group

texts.en:
Fayza is 49-year old married mother and one of her children is Aisha, who is 21-years old. Aisha is married and has no children.
Aisha has helped her mother in work since childhood. After she got married she wanted to improve her and her husband's life. Therefore she decided to participate with her mother in her business.
The business is a grocery store located in an area which is nearby residential neighborhoods and far from major markets. 
The mother and the daughter want to improve their standard of living and work hard to live comfortably with their families. They have a vision to become productive women. They hope to reach the level of a better living standard. Each one of them has dreams; the mother wants to support her children's studies and the daughter wants to establish a stable life with her husband. 
Now they are applying for a loan to help them buy more products to sell and to add new varieties of food to their market to increase their sales and incomes. They need your support to achieve their dreams.

loans.use: To buy more products and food supplies for their grocery to increase their incomes.

loans.name: Gloria Elizabeth

texts.es:
Gloria, de 47 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, está casada, tiene 2 hijo y se dedica a la venta de elotes con su esposo para la elaboración de tamales.

Gloria, se dedica a la compra y venta de elotes desde hace 3 años con su esposo y se dedica a este negocio por que en la zona se venden bastante los tamales de elotes.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar más elotes para hacer tamales y vender en otros lugares donde hay posibles clientes.

Gloria, sueña con comprar un mejor vehículo para poder salir a vender a otros lugares más lejos.
texts.en:
Gloria, 47 years old, studied until high school. She is married, has two children and works with her husband selling corn for making tamales.

Gloria has been buying and selling corn for three years with her husband. She has been engaged in this work because a lot of tamales are sold in the area.

She needs the loan to buy more corn for making tamales to sell in other places where there are potential customers.

Gloria dreams of buying a better vehicle so she can make sales calls in places further away.

loans.use: to buy more corn for making tamales and to sell in other places where there are potential customers

loans.name: Véronique

texts.fr: Agée de 24 ans et habitant à Avédji, Véronique est une mère de quatre enfants. Pour trouver son revenu, Véronique vend du charbon de bois afin de gagner sa vie et favoriser l’épanouissement de ses enfants. Pour acheter des sacs de charbons de bois, Véronique demande ce crédit pour réaliser sa commande et  maximiser son profit pour aider son mari dans les diverses charges quotidiennes.
texts.en:
Véronique is 24 years old and lives in Avédji and has four children.  Véronique makes a living by selling charcoal. In this way she supports herself and ensures the well-being of her children. 

She is requesting this loan to buy bags of charcoal and maximize her profit margin in order to help her husband with everyday expenses.

loans.use: to buy three bags of charcoal.

loans.name: Fareedah

texts.en:
Fareedah is 42 years old and has six children. She lives with her husband and her children in a sector of Jordan called Dairalla. 
Fareedah used to work as a farmer but recently she has been suffering from back pains which prevent her from farming.
She wants to be an independent, productive woman and also have a social life. She wants to meet her children's needs, Despite all the challenges faced by Fareedah as a poor woman, she began to achieve her dream and help her husband with the household expenses.
She built a small room beside her house and opened a grocery business in it. She became successful and known in her area. 
She requested a loan to help her buy more products and food supplies to sell so she can increase her income and improve her standard of living. Then she can meet the basic and educational needs of her children.

loans.use: to buy more products and food supplies to sell

loans.name: Nora

texts.en:
Nora previously accessed a 40,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase more computer units needed in her business. It was indeed a milestone for her, most especially as she was able to provide a better income for her family. 

She would now like to apply for a 50,000 PHP loan for the same reason. She would use this to maintain her computer shop and at the same time add more PC units to her current inventory. She hopes that your hearts will be touched and your support will be with her in her aim to do better. 

Nora hopes that her business will just continue to expand, and wants just to have good health for her household. She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to maintain her computer shop and at the same time add more PC units to her current inventory.

loans.name: Daira Alejandra

texts.es:
Daira, mayor de edad soltera, originaria de Caldas, es una microempresaria administradora y propietaria de su propio negocio el cual consiste en la compra y venta de lociones. 

Se caracteriza por ser una joven muy trabajadora y responsable, también con muchos deseos de superación personal, tiene clientes tanto al crédito como al contado que recupera quincenal o mensualmente.

Inicio este negocio con fondos propios debido a la necesidad de trabajar y el deseo de mejorar los ingresos en su hogar, tuvo el compromiso de salir adelante con el esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo que ha realizado durante 4 años en el cual ha demostrado su responsabilidad de pago en tiempo y forma, uno de sus sueños es poder llegar a tener un gran negocio. 

Desde muy temprano ella se levanta a abrir su negocio para empezar a vender y poder salir adelante.

El objetivo de este crédito es para poder comprar más surtido de lociones.
 
Daira se siente muy agradecido por el apoyo económico que Kiva le brinda a las personas más necesitadas.
texts.en:
Daira, an unmarried adult from Caldas, is manager and owner of her own small business, which consists of buying and selling lotions.  She characterizes herself as being a responsible, hardworking young woman, and also has a great desire for personal success.  She has both cash and credit customers, and collects payment biweekly or monthly.

She started this business with her own funds because she needed to work and wanted to increase her household income. She was committed to making the effort to get ahead and continued doing the work that she had been doing for four years, and she has demonstrated her responsibility by paying in a timely manner.  One of her dreams is being able to become a big business.

She gets up very early to open her business so that she can start selling and be able to get ahead.  The purpose of this loan is to purchase and stock up on more lotions.  Daira feels very grateful for the financial support that Kiva offers to people most in need.

loans.use: to purchase and stock up on more lotions.

loans.name: Paola Andrea

texts.es:
25, a sus 47 años de edad, es una mujer carismática y servicial que se dedica a trabajar en su propio negocio, una tienda de abarrotes que inició por la necesidad de generar ingresos para sacar adelante a su familia. 

A pesar de las adversidades, ella tuvo la fortaleza y la determinación para levantarse y seguir adelante y, gracias a ello lleva 2 años de trayectoria en esta actividad.

Trabaja todos los días durante 6 horas con 1 empleado
Su propósito en la vida es seguir progresando y por ello desea fortalecer su negocio acreditándolo con la compra de surtido de productos como abarrotes, granos, frituras, bebidas gaseosas y en general productos básicos de la canasta familiar, de esta forma podrá ofrecer a sus clientes una mejor calidad y servicio, logrando aumentar notablemente sus ventas y los ingresos que recibe de sus ventas.

Paola manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo su negocio con la ayuda de Interactuar, en el que los clientes puedan encontrar todos los artículos que necesiten. 

Apoyando a este crédito estarás contribuyendo con el emprendimiento de las mujeres Colombianas!
texts.en:
Paola at 47 years old is a charismatic and helpful woman who works in her own business, a grocery store. She started it out of the need to generate income to get her family ahead. In spite of adversity she has had the strength and determination to pick herself up and move forward. Thanks to this she has two years experience in her business. She works every day for 6 hours and has an employee.

Her goal in life is to continue to progress and she wants to fortify her business with the purchase of an assortment of products like groceries, grains, fried foods and soft drinks and general basic food items. In this way she can offer her clients better quality and service and manage to increase her sales notably as well as the income she makes from her sales.

Paola says that her main wish is to continue to expand her business with the support of Interactuar so that her customers can find all the items they need. Supporting this loan you are contributing to the entrepreneurship of Colombian women!

loans.use: to buy an assortment of products like groceries, grains, fried foods and soft drinks.

loans.name: Rosa Del Carmen

texts.es:
Rosa, de 47 años de edad, estudio segundo grado, está acompañada, tiene 1 hijo de 1 año de edad y su pareja se dedica al comercio de mariscos. 

Rosa,se dedica a comercializar marisco desde hace dos años, este trabajo lo aprendió con su pareja y decidió dedicarse  a este negocio por que da buenas ganancias, para vender sus productos tienen que caminar aproximadamente 10 kilómetros.


El préstamo lo necesitara para comprar  más mariscos, de esa manera tener suficiente producto para abastecer a sus clientes.

Rosa, sueña con tener un local fijo para vender en el  mercado.
texts.en: Rosa is 47 years old and went to school as far as the second grade. She lives with her partner, and they have one child who is one year old. Her partner works selling seafood. Rosa has also worked for two years selling seafood, after learning this work from her partner. She decided to dedicate herself to this work because it provides a good income. In order to sell her products she needs to walk for about 10 kilometers. She needs the loan to buy more seafood, so that she will have enough to supply her customers. Rosa dreams of having a stall in the market from which to sell.

loans.use: to buy more seafood.

loans.name: Maripositas De Collpani Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “MARIPOSITAS DE COLLPANI” iniciará el décimo primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Rosmery es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: confección y venta de trajes para damas, venta de ropa, venta de productos por catálogo, tienda de barrio, venta de productos de telefonía, venta de edredones y frazadas.	
El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Rosmery es integrante, ella indica que hace cinco años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una vecina que forma parte de la asociación comunal.
En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de confección y venta trajes para dama, da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió de su esposo hace varios años.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de tela por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente, a la elaboración, lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es casada y tiene un  hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The communal bank “MARIPOSITAS DE COLLPANI” [Butterflies of Collpani] will start its eleventh cycle in Pro Mujer [Pro-Woman] as part of the Centro Focal de Collpani [Focal Center of Collpani]. The group is comprised of 8 members and is directed by an executive board, where Mrs. Rosmery is the president. The businesses of the communal bank members are varied. They include: the manufacture and sale of garments for women, the sale of clothes, the sale of catalog products, a convenience store, the sale of telephone merchandise, and the sale of quilts and blankets.

The loan they request will benefit small microenterprises of which Mrs. Rosmery is a member. She points out that she has been part of Pro Mujer for 5 years, entering upon being invited by a neighbor of hers who is part of the communal bank. Nowadays, she owns a business of manufacture and sale of garments for women. She tells us she learned this trade from her husband several years ago.

The purpose of the loan she is requesting is to increase her physical capital (purchase of cloth wholesale). She will acquire it from wholesalers from the city of La Paz. Afterwards, she will start manufacture, and will market it at her point of sale. This work allows her to generate the resources necessary to support her family financially, as she is married and has a son.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says she likes the health services the institution offers.

loans.use: to purchase cloth wholesale.

loans.name: Zarah

texts.en:
Like other people, what Zarah just dreams of for her family is to get out of the breadline and have a more affordable kind of living someday. Aiming to fast track this, Zarah  manages her current business (a sari-sari store) with a lot of passion and diligence. Recently, she accessed a loan that was faithfully paid back. With the given amount of Php 50,000, she was able to supply her store with a sufficient supply of grocery items that she sold as a source of income. 

To continue the improvement in her current inventory, she would like to request again for a loan, this time amounting to PHP 40,000 that she will be using in buying more stock and supplies of merchandise products. If granted, this will be a wide-open opportunity for her to earn a better profit. If this happens, it will be a great help for her family's expenditures. 

For now, she would like to give you her sincerest thanks. 

She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To buy grocery items, toiletries, beverages and other products to expand her product inventory.

loans.name: Enis Rosa

texts.es:
Madre de 2 hijos y con un gran deseo verlos convertidos en todos unos profesionales es el motivo que llena de entusiasmo y animo la señora Enis de 35 años de edad a trabajar incansablemente en su criadero de cerdos y pollos pues aspira que con este humilde empleo brindarles una educación universitaria a todos sus hijos ya que no quiere verlos en un corral realizando estas funciones.

Necesita de una actividad capaz de generar los recursos suficientes para cubrir estos gastos y sin descuidar los gastos primordiales del hogar.
Se ve en la necesidad de solicitar un crédito para la compra de cerdos los cuales criara y engordara para su posterior venta. 

Enis está muy motivada con este gran proyecto ya que sus hijos demuestran buenas actitudes estudiantiles y disposición para triunfar y hacer que sus padres se sientan más que orgulloso de sus hijos
texts.en: As a mother of 2 children, her great desire to see them become professionals is what encourages Enis and fills her with enthusiasm. She is 35 years old and works tirelessly raising pigs and chickens. With this humble work she hopes to provide her children with a university education, because she does not want to see them doing the same work in a farmyard. She needs work that will allow her to earn enough income to pay for these costs, as well as the household expenses. She needs a loan in order to buy pigs that she will raise and fatten, and later sell. Enis is very motivated by this project, as her children have show good aptitude with their studies, and a willingness to succeed and to make their parents even more proud of them.

loans.use: to buy pigs that she will raise and fatten, and later sell.

loans.name: Kateryn Vanessa

texts.es:
Sin mucho capital, Kateryn montó su taller de confección con el ánimo de generar ingresos con los cuales pueda sostener los gastos de su hogar donde convive con sus 2 hijos y su esposo. 
La actividad la aprendió a través de un amigo y esto le ha permitido realizar trabajos que se caracterizan por su buena calidad y su puntualidad en la entrega. 

Con sus trabajos, Kateryn ha logrado captar un gran número de clientes que le han garantizado muy buenas ventas mensuales, por lo que espera que su negocio siga creciendo y posteriormente pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas. 

Con la finalidad de responder a la demanda sus clientes, Kateryn busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de una maquina de confeccion y a la compra de insumos.

Kateryn espera que así su familia pueda gozar de unos mejores ingresos los cuales les permitan tener una mejor calidad de vida y una educación de mejor calidad. 

Además, Kateryn espera que si su negocio sigue ampliándose a un buen ritmo y que en su taller pueda generar como mínimo un empleo para una persona que lo requiera y no tenga oportunidades laborales.
texts.en:
Without a lot of capital, Kateryn opened her sewing workshop with the aim of generating income to sustain the expenses of her household where she lives with her two children and her husband. She learned the trade from a friend and this has allowed her to do work which is know for it's good quality and her punctuality in filling her orders.

With her work Kateryn has manged to attract a good number of clients which guarantees her good monthly sales. So she hopes for her business to keep growing and later be able to generate employment for more needy people.

With the goal of responding to the demand from her clients Kateryn is looking for a loan that would give her the possibility to purchase a sewing machine and buy supplies.

Kateryn hopes that in this way her family can enjoy greater income which would allow her to have a higher quality of living and a higher quality of education. Kateryn also hopes that her business continues to expand at a good rate and that her shop can generate a minimum of employing one person that needs work and can't find any employment opportunities.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and supplies.

loans.name: Armida

texts.es:
Armida tiene 51 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar por la época de la guerra, está casada y su esposo se dedica a la apicultura, tiene un hijo que trabaja como ayudante de mecánico.	

Armida tiene una pequeña tienda de productos de la canasta básica desde hace 27 años, se dedicó a esto para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar, además vende miel en su casa la cual prepara junto a su esposo. 

Ella solicita este crédito para comprar 4 colmenas para el apiario que posee con su esposo y también necesita comprar más productos de la canasta básica para su tienda 

Ella sueña con tener más colmenas para aumentar la producción de miel y además desea que su tienda siga en marcha.
texts.en:
Armida is 51 years old. She did not have the opportunity to study as it was wartime. She is married and her husband works in beekeeping. She has a son who works as an assistant mechanic.

Armida has had a small general store for 27 years. She does this to help her husband with the household expenses. She also sells honey in her home which she prepares with her husband.

She is asking for this loan in order to buy four beehives for the apiary that she and her husband own. She also needs to buy more staples for her store.

She dreams of having more beehives in order to expand the honey production and also to keep her store moving along.

loans.use: to buy four beehives for the apiary that she and her husband own and also she needs to buy more staples for her store

loans.name: Najeyah

texts.en:
Najeyah is a 46-year-old married woman with five children and lives in Dairalla.

Najeyah wants to be a productive woman and wants to help her husband with the household expenses, so she bought a sewing machine 20 years ago and started her own business in her home. She sews clothes and all kinds of products and sells them until now.

She said that through this sewing machine she could help her oldest son to complete his education, majoring in chemistry, and she hopes to help more and more to complete the education for her other children.

Now she wants to expand her work and develop it to be able to help her husband more and more with the household expenses  because of a high standard of living, therefore she applied for a loan to help her buy more fabrics and yarns and to do maintenance on her sewing machine to increase the quality of her products and produce a larger number of the products so increase her profits.

loans.use: To do maintenance on her sewing machine and to buy more fabrics and yarns

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy more stock of onions,cabbages, tomatoes and other items

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan es una persona que ha tenido que atravesar muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo siempre ha tenido la fortaleza para superarlas y salir adelante junto con sus hijos. 

Hace aproximadamente 5 años inició la búsqueda de una fuente de ingresos para su hogar. Fue así como inició la cría y venta de pollos, negocio que le ha venido generando ganancias con las cuales puede sostener los gastos de su hogar. 

Juan busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de cuido para los pollos, adecuar el corral de sus pollos. Sabe que con la ayuda de la Corporación Interactuar puede lograrlo.

Juan tiene la esperanza en que el préstamo le permita salir adelante con su negocio. Además, espera que su negocio crezca y genere mayores ingresos con los cuales pueda ofrecer tener mayores oportunidades de progreso. 

Con un préstamo que hagas hoy podrás mejorar la vida y el negocio de Juan!
texts.en:
Juan is a person who has been through many hardships in his life, however, he has always had the strength to overcome them and get ahead together with his children.  About five years ago, he began searching for a source of income for his home.  That’s how he began raising and selling chickens, a business that has generated income with which he can pay the household expenses.

Juan is seeking a loan that makes it possible for him to purchase feed for the chickens, and to repair the chicken coop.  He knows that he will achieve his goals with the help of “Ineractuar” Corporation.  Juan hopes that the loan will allow him to get ahead with his business.  In addition, he hopes that his business will grow and generate higher income with which he can have greater opportunities to succeed.  With the loan that you make today, you will be able to improve Juan’s life and his business!

loans.use: to purchase feed for the chickens, and to repair the chicken coop.

loans.name: Luis Fernando

texts.es:
Luis es un hombre de 47 años de edad fuerte, trabajador, humilde y servicial lleva trabajando en su finca gran parte de su vida y todos sus conocimientos los aprendió gracias a su familia que realizan actividades similares. 

Vive en el municipio de Dabeiba en donde comparte su vida con su esposa.

Solicita un crédito para la compra de abonos, riegos, semillas de café y fungicidas buscando mejorar y aumentar su producción pues es soñador y piensa en tener un gran cultivo muy prospero.
texts.en: Luis is a 47 year old man. He is strong, hardworking, humble and helpful.
