Fátima es una joven trabajadora de 22 años de edad, estudió hasta quinto grado, está acompañada y su pareja se dedica a ayudante de albañil, tiene una hija de 4 años que se encuentra estudiando kínder.


Desde pequeña, Fátima iba con su madre a vender pan, refrescos, entre otros productos, es por ello que ahora se dedica a la misma actividad, vende los productos en los buses y su madre le ayuda con el negocio.

Fátima solicita este préstamo para comprar verduras ya que quiere variar un poco con lo que vende.

Ella sueña con darle lo necesario a su hija para que nunca le falte nada.
texts.en:
Fátima is a hard-working, 22-year-old young woman. She studied up to fifth grade. She is in a relationship and her partner works as a bricklayer assistant. She has a 4-year-old daughter who is studying kindergarten.

Since childhood, Fátima used to join her mother selling bread, refreshments, among other products; it is why she is now in the same occupation. She sells the products on buses and her mother helps her with the business. Fátima is requesting this loan to buy vegetables since she wants to vary what she sells a little.

She dreams of providing for her daughter so that she never lacks anything.

loans.use: to buy vegetables to add a little variety to what she sells.

loans.name: Bibikhol

texts.en:
Bibikol is a generous woman. She was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in 1962. She is married with five children, and lives in a village with her family.  

Bibikol is a seller. She has many years of practice doing business in the domestic market. She buys and sells textiles. Additionally she has land where she plants agricultural products and gains a profit for her family. From the income that she earns from her business, she can pay for her children’s education and clothing. She is planning to widen her business and buy a new collection of textiles. Bibikol is requesting a loan to buy textiles from the city market for selling in the domestic market. She hopes to be supported and awaits your compassion.

loans.use: to buy textiles from the city market for selling in the domestic market.

loans.name: Filomena

texts.en: Filomena is requesting a loan of $1,000 to buy additional supplies to keep in her store, including sugar, salt, candles, cigarettes, noodles, biscuits, cooking oils, shampoo and other things to sell. She has been in business since 2013, which she started with her own working capital of $300. She wants to open a big store in the future, so she is taking this loan to improve her management of her business.

loans.use: to buy sugar, salt, candles, cigarettes, noodles, biscuits, cooking oils, shampoo and other things to sell.

loans.name: Azam

texts.en: Azam is a careful man. He was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1986. He is living in a small town with his family. He is married and has two children. His wife is a housekeeper. He is a welder. He has six years experience and knows well his trade. This summer he got sick and needs to be treated in order to be healthy and continue working. He is the breadwinner for his family and is responsible for their well-being and happiness. He appealed to IMON and KIVA asking for financial support to be treated at the hospital. He is awaiting support and is thankful for KIVA lender’s kindness.

loans.use: to be treated at the local hospital.

loans.name: Domingo Del Carmen

texts.es: Domingo de 43 años de edad, vive en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus 3 hijos una niña de 14 años y dos varones de 10 y 7 años de edad. Domingo es una persona trabajadora que se desempeña como motorista del transporte colectivo desde hace diez años, además los fines de semana atiende junto a su esposa su pequeño negocio de venta de pupusas. Domingo ya ha sido beneficiado con un crédito el cual utilizo para mejorar sus ventas en el negocio de pupusas ampliando la variedad de su producto  y vendiendo panes con pollo, debido al éxito obtenido y con el propósito de  ver su casa cada vez más bonita  solicita  un nuevo crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lamina y polines con la intención de cambiar el techo de su vivienda el cual en época de invierno le presenta filtraciones de agua..
texts.en: Domingo is 43 years old. He lives in his own house with his wife and 3 children, a 14 year old girl and two boys,  ages 10 and 7 years old. Domingo is a hard working person who has worked as a public bus driver for the past 10 years. On the weekends, he and his wife tend a small pupusas sales stand. Domingo has already been granted a loan which he used to improve his pupusas business, by expanding the variety of products and adding chicken sandwiches. Due to the success obtained and with the goal of improving his house, he is asking for a new loan from FUSAI to buy metal sheets and wooden poles to change the roof in his house, which leaks during the winter.

loans.use: To purchase metal sheets and wooden poles to change the roof in his house.

loans.name: Suyapa Concepcion

texts.es:
La  Señora Suyapa  de 45 años de edad es casada tiene 02 hijos  mayores de edad, vive en su casa de habitación  ubicada en la ciudad de Nacaome Valle al sur de Honduras y se dedica desde hace 21 años al negocio de la venta de tortilla, sus ventas es en su casa de habitación y de forma ambulante en el mercado.
Doña Suyapa es una mujer muy emprendedora que desde muchos años  lucha día con día para sacar adelante a su familia, se levanta desde muy temprano a lavar el maíz y quebrarlo para elaborar las deliciosas tortillas hechas a mano y luego venderlo a los vecinos del barrio y personas que a diario visitan el mercado.
Doña Suyapa está solicitando el préstamo para compra de maíz y leña, con el apoyo del crédito pretende surtir y mejorar su negocio y vivienda
Su sueño es remodelar su casa ya que está empezando a construir una al  lado de su casa.

San Lorenzo, Honduras  – Junio del 2015.
texts.en:
Suyapa is 45 years old and married. She has two adult children. She lives in her house located in the city of Nacaome Valle in the South of Honduras. For 21 years, she has made a living through her business of selling tortillas. She sells the tortillas both from her home and as a street vendor at the market. 

Suyapa is an entrepreneurial woman who has worked hard for many years to help her family move forward. She gets up very early to wash and grind the corn in order to make her delicious, handmade tortillas and then sell them to her neighbors and the people who visit the market each day. 

Suyapa is requesting the loan for the purchase of corn and firewood. With the support of this loan, she hopes to stock and improve her business and home. Her dream is to remodel her house, as she is beginning to construct a new one next to her house.

loans.use: to purchase corn and firewood for her business.

loans.name: Eun's Group

texts.en: A local farmer living in the Sangke district of Battambang province, Eun is 61 years old. She is a mother of nine children, one of whom is still dependent on her. For a living, she is raising pigs and selling grocery items as her main sources of income. Additionally, she is raising chickens to supplement her income. She has been involved in these businesses for twelve years and she manages to save about 21,700KHR each day for emergency needs. Now, her pigs are sick and she has to spend most of her income to cure the diseases. Eun has been with VisionFund (Kiva’s parter) for four loans already. This fifth time, Eun is leading a group of two members to get a new loan to buy feed for her chickens and pigs and use the rest of the money to buy more grocery items. She hopes to expand her business to earn additional income and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy feed for chickens and pigs and use the rest of the money to buy more grocery items.

loans.name: Karla Daniela

texts.es: A sus 22 años de edad Daniela es madre soltera, su hija tiene  3 años y su hijo 10 meses de edad, Daniela comenta que le gustaba estudiar pero desde que se quedo embarazada tuvo que dejar sus estudios, ahora es una madre amorosa, Daniela para sacar adelante e sus hijos se dedica a la crianza de animales menores, ella solicita el dinero del crédito para invertirlo en la compra de chanchos, Daniela  vive con su madre, su abuelita, su hijo y su hija, Daniela desea seguir trabajando en su negocio y  mejorarlo  para sacar adelante a su hijo e hija y de alguna manera espera que a futuro estudien y que tengan un buen futuro y no se queden como ella a medio camino en los estudios.
texts.en:
Daniela, age 22, is a single mother.  She has a three year old daughter and a ten month old son.  Daniela says that she liked going to school, but she got pregnant and had to quit school.  She is now a loving mother.  Daniela raises small animals In order to get her children ahead.

She is requesting the money from the loan to buy pigs.  

Daniela lives with her mother, her grandmother, her son, and her daughter.  Daniela wishes to continue working in her business and to improve it in order to get her son and daughter ahead.  Somehow she hopes that they go to school in the future and that they had a good future.  She hopes that they do not stop halfway through their education as she did.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Rosa Alba

texts.es: Rosa es una señora muy trabajadora, ella tiene 46 años de edad, Rosa es madre soltera y tiene una hija de 22 años, Rosa vive con su madre, su hija y 2 nietos, Rosa se dedica a trabajar de empleada domestica y tiene su negocio de crianza de animales menores, Rosa solicita el dinero del crédito para invertirlo en la compra de chanchos, Rosa desea seguir en la crianza de sus animales que son su fuente de ingresos y espera mejorar este negocio para el bien estar de su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa is a very hardworking woman. She is 46 years old, a single mother, and has a 22-year-old daughter. Rosa lives with her mother, her daughter, and her two nephews. 

Rosa makes a living by working as a housekeeper and also has a business of raising small animals. She is requesting the loan in order to invest it in the purchase of pigs. She hopes to continue working in raising animals, since this is her source of income, and hopes to improve this business for the well-being of her family.

loans.use: to purchase pigs.

loans.name: Adelina

texts.en: Adelina is requesting a loan of 800 USD to improve her business. She sells gasoline. She started to sell petrol and gasoline a year ago with her own working capital of 800 USD. She earns a good income from this business, so she is very happy working at her business. She will use this loan to buy more gasoline. She lives near the main road, so many people come to buy her gasoline.

loans.use: To buy gasoline.

loans.name: Yenny Marleni

texts.es:
Yenny es una joven de 20 años de edad, está estudiando 2° año bachillerato, actualmente está soltera pero tiene una niña de 11 meses de edad, además ella y su hija vive en casa de su madre.

Ella trabaja en un comedor, ya tiene 1 año de trabajar en dicho lugar, demás se dedica al comercio de tortillas, actividad que tiene 8 años de realizar, ella trabaja de lunes a viernes de 5:30 AM a 3:30 PM.

Ella solicita este crédito para comprar 6 quintales de maíz y continuar con la venta de tortillas.

Ella sueña con terminar sus estudios y conseguir un buen trabajo para sacar a su familia adelante.
texts.en:
Yenny is a 20-year-old young adult who is in her 2nd year of college. She currently is single but has an 11-month-old baby. She and her daughter live in her mother's house.

For the last year Yenny has been working in a dining hall, and she also has worked selling tortillas for the last 8 years. She works from 5:30 AM to 3:30 PM Monday through Friday.

She is requesting a loan to buy 600 kg of corn and to continue selling tortillas. She dreams of finishing her studies and acquiring a good job to support her family.

loans.use: to buy 600 kg of corn and to continue selling tortillas.

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es:
La señora María de los Ángeles de 40  años de edad es casada, tiene dos  hijos que dependen de ella, se dedica desde hace 13 años al negocio de compra venta de abarrotería, es una mujer trabajadora con deseos de salir adelante.
Doña María de Los Ángeles está solicitando el préstamo para la  compra de abarrotería en general como ser  maíz, jabón, pollo, aceite, manteca, frescos huevos, carnes, pan, queso, etc. para surtir su negocio y poder satisfacer a sus clientes.
Doña María de los Ángeles con el apoyo de este crédito pretende mejorar sus ingresos, es su quinto crédito que  solicita a Prisma, está muy contenta de seguir trabajando con la institución ya que todos los créditos los ha  invertido en su negocio y a gracias a esto ha podido salir adelante.
 Su sueño es mejorar su casa y su negocio.

San Lorenzo, Honduras- Junio del 2015.
texts.en:
Maria de los Ángeles,  age 40 , is married and has two children who depend on her for support. She has earned a living for 13 years by selling grocery store items. She is a hard-working woman who wants to get ahead in life.

Maria de los Ángeles is asking for a loan to buy general grocery sales items such as corn, soap, chicken, cooking oil, shortening, fresh eggs, meat, bread, and cheese, etc. in order to stock her business and to meet her customers’ needs.
 
With the help of this loan she plans to increase her earnings. This is the fifth loan she has requested from Prisma.  She is happy to keep working with the institution.   She has invested all of the loans in her business, and thanks to this she has been able to get ahead.

Her dream is to improve her house and her business.

San Lorenzo, Honduras – June, 2015

loans.use: to buy corn, soap, chicken, cooking oil, shortening, fresh eggs, meat, bread, and cheese, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Toeur's Group

texts.en: Toeur is 39-years-old and a farmer living in the Srey Snom district of Siem Reap province. She is a married mother of four dependent children. Three of them are in school, while the other one is too young to attend school. She struggles making a living growing rice and cassava as the main sources of her income. To supplement income, she raises chickens and she sometimes works on others cassava farms. She has been in the business for 30 years. In fact, she can only earn approximately 28,000KHR per day and manages to save about 8,000KHR each day. Her current challenge is there are insects destroying her cash crops and lots of weeds in the farmland. These don't allow good yields for her business. This is the second time for Toeur with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). As a group leader, Toeur will use her loan to spend money on plowing fees and to buy fuel to support her business. She hopes to expand her business by growing more crops on an additional plot of farmland.

loans.use: to pay plowing fees and buy fuel to support her business

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Srey Snom district

loans.name: Rosa Dilma

texts.es: Rosa de 48 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida, sus cuatro hijos y su nieto, ella se dedica desde hace varios años a la elaboración y venta de tortillas, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz por quintales y cal para poder continuar con la elaboración de las tortillas y así poder tener mejores ingresos para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosa, age 48, lives in her own house with her life partner, their four children, and her grandson.  For several years she has been making and selling tortillas.  Her business is located at her house, and she has a lot of customers.

She is requesting a loan to buy corn by the ‘quintal’ [approximately 100 pounds] and lime powder in order to be able to continue making the tortillas.  

This way she will be able to have better earnings in order to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: o buy corn by the ‘quintal’ [approximately 100 pounds] and lime powder.

loans.name: Gente Emprendedora Group

texts.es: La Sra. Balbina de 55 años de edad, es soltera con 2 hijos que ya no dependen de ella. Es la presidenta de la alcancía comunal “Gente Emprendedora” conformada por 5 mujeres de la misma zona donde viven y que se identifican con el nombre del grupo que conforman. Balbina se dedica a vender pollo al por menor en su puesto en un mercado muy cerca de su casa, además vende queso y lácteos, es por esto la solicitud del crédito para comprar pollos, lácteos y también para renovar su puesto de venta. Uno de los sueños que Ella tiene es comprar otro puesto de venta en el mercado, donde pueda ofrecer todo tipo de lácteos  y embutidos generando así trabajo a sus amigas que tanto lo necesitan. En la foto del grupo la Sra. Balbina se encuentra de pie en medio de sus demás compañeras sentadas.
texts.en:
Balbina is 55 years old and she has two children who no longer depend on her. She is the president of the "Gente Emprendedora" ["Enterprising People"] communal bank, made up of five women who live in the same area, and who identify with the name of the group they belong to.

Balbina earns a living selling chicken from a marketplace stall located very close to her home, and she also sells cheese and dairy products.

She is requesting this loan to buy chicken and dairy products, as well as to renovate the stall where she works from.

One of Balbina's dreams is to buy another stall in the market, to allow her to offer all kinds of dairy products and lunch meats for sale. This will also generate work opportunities for her friends who are in such need of work.

In the group picture, Balbina is standing among her fellow members who are seated.

loans.use: to buy chicken, cheese and dairy products.

loans.name: Cesaltina

texts.en: Cesaltina has been involved in business activities for a few years. She started off with her own working capital of $500.00. Cesaltina is requesting a loan of $800.00 to improve her business. She sells gasoline because she earns a good income from it. She lives near the main road and every day many people come to buy her gasoline, making her happy to do this as her business. When Tuba Rai Metin offered her the loan, she was very happy because she could improve her business. She is taking out this loan to buy more gasoline.

loans.use: To buy gasoline.

loans.name: Cordelia Carolina

texts.es: CORDELIA CAROLINA: Es una señora sonriente y luchadora, pertenece a la etnia miskita de la Ciudad de Bilwi, municipio de Puerto Cabezas. Tiene 52 años de edad, madre soltera de 4 hijos: 3 son mayores de edad y el menor de 23 años estudia su secundaria. Desde hace 8 años habita en casa de familiares, con el propósito de reducir el hacinamiento y tener su propia casa, está solicitando financiamiento para iniciar la construcción de su vivienda de concreto y comprar materiales de construcción: Bloques, cemento, hierro. Ella sueña con terminar la construcción de su vivienda para vivir de manera segura y digna.
texts.en:
Cordelia Carolina is a joyful, determined woman who belongs to the Miskito ethnicity of the city of Bilwi, in the municipality of Puerto Cabezas. She is 52 years old and a single mother of four children, three of whom are adults and the youngest of whom is 23 years old and studying in high school. 

For eight years, Cordelia Carolina has lived in her relatives' house. With the goal of reducing overcrowding and having her own home, she is requesting a loan to start construction on her own concrete house and to purchase construction materials like blocks, cement, and iron. Her dream is to finish the construction of her home in order to live safely and with dignity.

loans.use: to start the construction of her concrete home and purchase construction materials like blocks, cement, and iron.

loans.name: Galina

texts.en: Galina is a hardworking woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1971. She lives in a small town with ancient history. She is a widow and has two children. She has a sick daughter that needs to be treated. Galina works at a government agency, but her salary is not enough to pay for her daughter's treatment at the medical clinic. She is asking for financial support from Kiva and IMON to pay for her daughter's treatment at the medical clinic. She hopes to be supported and have a healthy daughter.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's treatment at a medical clinic

loans.name: Evelio

texts.es:
Evelio, se dedica a la construcción y reformas de viviendas en el municipio de Puerto Salgar, negocio con el cual sostiene a sus dos hijas.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de herramientas y una moto para desplazarse hasta las diferentes obras de construcción que tiene.

Con este préstamo podrá mejorar su forma de trabajar, lo que se verá reflejado en el aumento de sus ingresos.

Apoya a Evelio con un préstamo para que pueda continuar con su actividad!
texts.en:
Evelio works in construction and remodeling houses in the municipality of Puerto Salgar, a business which allows him to support his two daughters. 

He is requesting a loan for the purchase of tools and a motorcycle in order to travel to the different construction sites he has. With this loan, he will be able to improve the way he works, which will be reflected in an increase in his income. Support Evelio with a loan so that he can continue with his business!

loans.use: to purchase tools and a motorcycle in order to travel to the different construction sites he has.

loans.name: Jader Luis

texts.es:
Las personas en el municipio de San Pedro son personas luchadoras y muy emprendedoras, Jader es un claro ejemplo de ello, pues con su trabajo de taller de reparaciones eléctricas ha podido superar tiempos difíciles en la parte económica.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de repuestos para electrodomésticos los cuales serán muy necesarios en su trabajo.

Apoyando este crédito, estará ayudando a un hombre que debe sostener a tres hijos y a una esposa.
texts.en:
The people in the town of San Pedro are very enterprising and hardworking people.  Jader is a good example of this, because with his electronics repair workshop he has managed to thrive through difficult economic times.

He is asking for a loan for the purchase of spare parts for household appliances.  These are very necessary for his work.

By supporting this loan, you will be helping a man who should support his three children and his wife.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for household appliances, which are very necessary in his work

loans.name: María Del Carmen

texts.es:
María de 37 años de edad,  estudió hasta 3º año de bachillerato, está casada y su esposo trabaja en una empresa de televisión por cable, tiene una hija que se encuentra estudiando en la escuela.

 María se dedica a vender pasteles de carne todos los días fuera de su casa, además vende gelatinas, flanes, charamuscas y Choco-bananos, el negocio lo aprendió porque su madre la animó y por la necesidad de obtener ingresos, su hija es quien le ayuda a María todas las tardes.

María solicita este crédito para comprar una cocina pues quiere continuar con el negocio de venta de pupusas. 

Ella sueña con tener una pupuseria grande y que su hija se supere.
texts.en:
María is 37 years old and studied until the third year of high school. She is married, and her husband works for a cable television company. She has one daughter who is studying in school.

María works selling meat pies everyday outside of her home. She also sells gelatin desserts, flan, charamuscas (a frozen juice treat), and chocolate-covered bananas. She learned the business because her mother encouraged her, and also because of the necessity to earn an income. Her daughter helps her every afternoon. 

María requests this loan to buy a stove because she wants to continue with the business of selling pupusas. She dreams of owning a large pupusa shop and of seeing her daughter succeed.

loans.use: to buy a stove to continue the business of selling pupusas (a stuffed corn tortilla dish).

loans.name: Ol

texts.en:
Ol, who lives in the Srey Snom district of Siem Reap province, is a farmer and a married mother of three dependent children. One of her children is in school while the other two are too young to attend school. She grows cassava and paddy rice for her main sources of income. Her 14-year-old businesses earn her a decent daily income and she manages to save about 8,500KHR per day. 

She faces two main challenges now. There are lots of insects destroying her cash crop and lots of weeds blocking their growth. This is her second time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she fully paid her past loan back. Now she is applying for a loan of 2,000,000KHR to pay for plowing fees and to buy cassava seeds. She hopes to earn more income to support her family and to buy pigs to raise.

loans.use: to pay for plowing fees and buy cassava seeds

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Srey Snom district

loans.name: Risolat

texts.en: Risolat is a generous woman. She was born in the southern part of Tajikistan to a family of farmers. Risolat lives in a village with her family. She is divorced and has one child. Risolat has been a teacher about four years. She understands her duties and tries to educate each of her students attentively. Her mother is old and sick. It is her duty to help her mother to receive treatment. She applied for a loan from KIVA and IMON to have her mother treated in a medical clinic. She awaits the KIVA lenders’ compassion.

loans.use: to have her mother treated in a medical clinic.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en:
Yolanda is 43-years-old and married with four children.  With two children in school, Yolanda works very hard to provide for them.

Yolanda has a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 20000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional stock of groceries to sell.

Yolanda has been in this business for twenty years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, shampoo, canned goods and other groceries. 

In the future Yolanda would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Maricris

texts.en: Maricris is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Maricris is 37 years old and has three children, who are in school. Maricris has a general store in the Philippines. She applied for a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy additional stocks of groceries to sell. Maricris has been in this business for five years. In the future, Maricris would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Ronalyn

texts.en: Ronalyn is 37 years old, married, and has three children. With the three children in school, she works very hard to provide for them. Ronalyn runs a general store in the Philippines and applied for a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more groceries to sell. Ronalyn has been in this business for four years, and she sells a variety of items, such as snack food, canned goods and other groceries. In the future, Ronalyn would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es:
Jorge, de 23 tiene experiencia en el área de comidas y bar, hace algún tiempo inicio con su propio negocio que hasta ahora le ha generado muy buenos resultados.

Siempre ha preferido trabajar independiente, y su padre le enseño unos buenos valores.

Actualmente necesita un auxilio para realizar la compra de licor, gaseosas y algunos snacks, así podrá abastecer su negocio y podrá mejorar su oferta.

Con esta ayuda podrá trabajar de una manera más organizada y con mejor capital de trabajo
texts.en:
Jorge, age 23, has experience in the food and bar industry.  A while ago he began his own business and it has generated good results through today.

He has always preferred to work on his own, and his father taught him good values.

Currently he needs help to buy liquor, soda, and some snacks.  In this way he will be able to stock his business and can improve his menu.  With this help he will be able to work in a more organized fashion, with better working capital.

loans.use: to buy liquor, soda, and some snacks to stock his business and improve his menu.

loans.name: Paola Andrea

texts.es:
Paola se dedica a su negocio de cerrajería y soldadura de metal, siendo una madre muy responsable.
 
Por medio de su trabajo, ha tenido la oportunidad de mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia. 

Por esta razón quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de herramientas para facilitar su trabajo como tranzador, prensa, compresor, un soldador y herramienta de mano. 

Con estos elementos podrá continuar prestando su servicio ya que la herramienta que utiliza esta en mal estado y hay otra que le hace falta.
texts.en: Paola works for her own business as a locksmith and metalworker while also being a very responsible mother. Through her work she has had the opportunity to improve the standard of living for her family. This is the reason she wants to seek a loan to purchase tools to facilitate her work such as a compass, press, compressor, welder and hand tools. With these items she will be able to continue providing her services because the tools that she currently uses are in bad condition and she is missing others.

loans.use: to purchase tools to facilitate her work such as a compass, press, compressor, welder and hand tools.

loans.name: Many's Group

texts.en: Many, who is a resident of the Steung Treng district of Steung Treng province, is a 37-year-old mother of three dependent children. All of them are in school. She grows cassava as her main source of income. She also sells rice and food to supplement her income. She has been in this business for years. This is her second loan from VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), and she fully repaid her past loan. As the leader of a two-member group, Many will use her loan to buy cassava seeds and pay for workers’ fees. She hopes to get high yields from her cassava farm, to make her standard of living much better than before.

loans.use: to buy cassava seeds and pay for workers' fees.

location.town: Steung Treng Province, Steung Treng District

loans.name: Samphors' Group

texts.en: Samphors, 26, is a farmer living in the Bakan district of Pursat province. She is the mother of two dependent children. One of her children is in school, and the other is too young to attend school. She grows rice on one hectare of farmland, as her main source of income. Moreover, she sells firewood to supplement her income. She has been involved in this business for 26 years. Her main difficulty in harvesting good crop products is a lack of capital to support her business. She is applying for a new loan from VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), and this will be her second loan. As the leader of a group of five members, Samphors will use her loan to buy wood to renovate her old house. She hopes that she can provide her family with a comfortable house to live in.

loans.use: to buy wood to renovate her old house.

loans.name: Inelda

texts.es:
Inelda, a sus 22 años de edad, trabaja fuertemente en su tienda de abarrotes para poder tener un futuro más estable.

Vive en el municipio de San Pedro y es soltera, tiene plena fe en su negocio y está segura que éste le dará todo lo que ha soñado.

Solicita un apoyo económico para realizar la compra de surtido de abarrotes, bebidas, granos, verduras, entre otros; así podrá tener un inventario mucho mas solido.
texts.en:
At 22 years of age, Inelda works hard in her grocery store in order to be able to have a more stable future.

She lives in the town of San Pedro.  She is single.  She has a lot of faith in her business and is sure that it will give her everything she has dreamed of.

She is asking for a loan to purchase grocery items for her store: drinks, grains, and vegetables, among others.  In this way she will be able to have a much stronger inventory.

loans.use: to buy groceries: drinks, grains, and vegetables, among others, in order to have a much stronger inventory.

loans.name: Jaime Antonio

texts.es:
Jaime, del municipio de San Pedro, se gana la vida con el servicio de hospedaje y restaurante.

Con este negocio puede sostener a su esposa que es su mas grande compañía y apoyo.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de camas, ventiladores y muebles; los cuales le permitirán amoblar las habitaciones de su hotel y podrá ofrecer un mejor servicio.

El cliente es una persona muy responsable y trabajador, siempre busca la forma de mejorar su productividad
texts.en:
Jaime is from the town of San Pedro.  He earns his living with a restaurant and a hotel.

With this business, he is able to support his wife, who is his biggest support and companion.

He is asking for a loan for the purchase of beds, fans, and furniture.   These will allow him to furnish the rooms in his hotel, and he will be able to offer better service.

This client is a very responsible and hardworking person.  He is always looking for ways to improve his productivity.

loans.use: to buy beds, fans, and furniture, which will allow him to furnish the rooms in his hotel so he can offer better service.

loans.name: Olivia De Jesus

texts.es:
Olivia ha podido acumular grandes experiencias gratas en su vida, una de ellas es el poder trabajar en su propio negocio.
Es una madre amorosa y responsable y tiene muy presente el significado de la familia en su proceso productivo.

Ella solicita apoyo económico para obtener un préstamo y realizar la compra de surtido de productos de la canasta familiar, pues planea aumentar su oferta de productos y desea tener un inventario mucho más grande, así podrá tener los productos disponibles para sus clientes. 

Su mayor sueño es poder mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Olivia has been able to accumulate some great and wonderful experiences in her life.  One of these is being able to work in her own business.

She is a loving and responsible mother.  The meaning of family is a big part of her productive process.

She is asking for financial support in order to get a loan and stock her store with basic staples, because she is planning to increase the range of products she offers.  She wants to have a much larger inventory and, in this way, she can have more products available for her customers.

Her biggest dream is to be able to improve the condition of her house.

loans.use: to stock basic staples in her store in order to increase the range of products she offers

loans.name: Karen Brendaly

texts.es: Karen de 30 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos, ella posee desde hace varios años una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, Karen está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Karen, 30 years old, lives in her own house with her two children. She has had a small store for the past several years, located in her home. She has many customers because of her good prices and her friendliness when she’s selling. Karen is requesting a loan to be able to buy more soups, eggs, bulk grains, soft drinks, candies, sweet breads, etc. This way, she will be able to have a better income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: buy more soups, eggs, bulk grains, soft drinks, candies, sweet breads, etc.

loans.name: Felipe Antonio

texts.es:
Felipe tiene 39 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, actualmente está casado y su esposa vende frutas y verduras, tiene dos hijos de 12 y 6  años de edad, el hijo mayor estudia 7° grado y el menor estudia en Kínder.


Felipe tiene una tienda ubicada en su casa, en la cual vende todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad como bebidas, granos básicos, golosinas, jabones para lavar ropa, detergentes, etc; abrió este negocio por iniciativa propia ya que en su lugar de residencia no existía ninguna tienda; en el negocio también se involucra su esposa, quien atiende cuando Felipe sale a realizar algunas compras. 

Él necesita este crédito para comprar bebidas, golosinas, granos básicos, etc. y así tener muchos productos disponibles para sus clientes.

Felipe sueña con darle a su familia todo lo necesario para tener una vida digna, especialmente a sus hijos, ya que desea brindarles una buena educación y todo lo que ellos necesiten.
texts.en:
Felipe is 39 years old and has studied to High School level.  He is married and his wife sells fruit and vegetables.  He has two children that are 12 and 6 years old, one is in year 7 and the other is at nursery school.

Felipe has a shop based in his home from where he sells all types of everyday products like drinks, basic grains, candy, washing powder and detergents. He opened this business on his own initiative as there were no shops in his neighbourhood. His wife is also involved in the business and helps out when Felipe goes out to make purchases.   

He needs this loan in order to buy drinks, candy, basic grains and other goods so that he has a wide range of products available for his customers. 

Felipe dreams of being able to give his family everything necessary for a dignified life, especially his children, who he wishes to provide with a good education and everything else they may require.

loans.use: to buy drinks, candy, basic grains and other goods so that he has a wide range of products available for his customers

loans.name: Ángel Antonio

texts.es:
Ángel tiene 35 años de edad,  su familia no pudo mandarlo a la escuela, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, tiene dos hijos los cuales asisten a la escuela.  

Desde muy pequeño, Ángel se ha dedicado a la agricultura, además ahora tiene bueyes los cuales le sirven para arar la tierra, halar leña y los cultivos de maíz. 

Él solicita este crédito para pagar el alquiler del terreno donde tiene a sus bueyes y para comprar abono para aplicar a sus cultivos de maíz.

Él sueña con que sus hijos tengan la oportunidad de estudiar y que se ganen la vida de una forma diferente.
texts.en:
Ángel is 35 years old.  His family didn’t manage to send him to school.  He is married, and his wife works doing the household chores.  He has two children, who both attend school.

From a very young age, Ángel has worked in agriculture.  He also now has oxen, which allow him to plow the land and haul firewood and his corn crop.

He is asking for this loan to pay the rent on the land where he has his oxen, and to buy manure to apply to his corn crop.

He dreams that his children will have a chance to study and that they will be able to earn their living in a different way.

loans.use: to pay rent on a plot of land where he has his oxen, and to buy manure to apply to his corn crop

loans.name: Chantha's Group

texts.en:
A resident living in Bakan district of Pursat province, Chantha is 56 years old. She is a widowed mother of six children, four of whom are dependent on her. One of her children is still in school. 

To make a living, she grows rice as the main source of income. She sometimes works as a paid worker to supplement her income. She has been in her business for 36 years, and she can earn a decent income to support her living. Her challenge is that the crop grows not so good that it cannot produce good outputs for her. 

Lacking capital to support her business, Chantha is leading a group of five to take out a new loan. This is her fourth time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), and she has fully repaid her past loan. As a representative, she will use her loan to purchase wood to build a decent house to live in. She hopes to live in a comfortable house as others do and wants to improve her living standard much better.

loans.use: to purchase wood to build a decent house to live in

loans.name: Beathrix

texts.en:
Beathrix is taking a loan of $1,000 to improve her business. She is married and she has four children. 

She is running a business that helps her to generate income for her family. She will use the loan to buy thread. She opened her business a year ago with her own working capital of $200. 

Beathrix is a hardworking woman, and she hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy thread

loans.name: Maria Emilda

texts.es:
Maria tiene una habitación disponible en su casa la cual utiliza para arrendarla a la persona que lo necesite.

En estos momentos necesita algunas reparaciones para dejarla en óptimas condiciones para su renta, es por eso que solicita un préstamo, pues comprara pintura y cal para comenzar a arreglar las paredes de esta habitación.

Con este negocio intenta obtener algunos ingresos para poder sostenerse y aportar con los gastos en su hogar en el cual vive con sus 3 hijos ya que su esposo falleció hace tiempo.
texts.en:
Maria has an available room in her house which she uses to rent it out to anyone that needs it. Currently, the room needs some repairs in order to leave it in optimal condition for renting. 

Thus, she is requesting a loan to purchase paint and lime, in order to start repairing the walls of this room. With this business she is trying to obtain some income in order to support herself and help with the expenses of her household, where she lives with her three children since her husband passed away some time ago.

loans.use: to purchase paint and lime in order to start fixing the walls of this bedroom.

loans.name: Volatiana Claudine

texts.fr:
Volatiana Claudine est une jeune femme travailleuse et débrouillarde âgée de 28 ans. Elle est mariée et qui est dessinateur et travaille dans une société immobilière. Ils ont ensemble trois enfants de 6, 8, et 9 ans et qui sont tous scolarisés dans une école privée.
Elle dirige un magasin général depuis son émancipation pour aider son mari à soutenir la famille. Elle désire développer et étendre son activité pour pouvoir continuer à gagner de l'argent et augmenter son revenu afin de pouvoir toujours améliorer le niveau de vie de la famille, de scolariser ses enfants dans une bonne école.
Actuellement, la famille loue la maison dans laquelle elle habite, et elle s'efforce d'épargner davantage pour pouvoir réaliser son rêve de construire sa propre maison.
texts.en:
Volatiana Claudine is a hard-working and resourceful young woman. She is 28 years old and married to a draughtsman who works for a real estate business. They have three children together, aged six, eight and nine years old. They are all currently receiving an education at a private school. She runs her own general store to assist her husband in supporting their family. She hopes to develop and expand her business in order to continue making money and increase her revenue so she can increasingly improve her family's living conditions and be able to send her children to a good school.

Her family currently lives in a rented property. She is making an effort to save enough money to realise her dream of building her own home.

loans.use: to purchase a refrigerator worth 700,000 MGA, 50,000-MGA of flour and 100,000-MGA of sugar

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is a married mother of three children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees and food.

For over five years, she has operated an open air food selling business, selling from home to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her place of business. 

With the KES 20,000 she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tea leaves, and cooking fat. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tea leaves, and cooking fat

loans.name: Sonia Janeth

texts.es:
Sonia, una mujer de 24 años de edad que se ha esforzado mucho para criar a su hija de 9 años; gracias a una tienda que con mucho esfuerzo, paciencia y sacrificio logro montar, ha generado los ingresos para el sostenimiento de ella.

Trabaja sola todos los días durante 10 horas.
Buscando ser la mejor empresa familiar del sector quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de surtido que le permitan aumentar su inventario como granos y abarrotes.
De esta forma ira superando dificultades como las bajas ventas y la competencia.

Este crédito será la gran oportunidad para consolidarse como la tienda más productiva en la vereda.
texts.en:
Sonia is a 24-year-old woman who has made a great effort in order to raise her 9-year-old daughter. Thanks to a store, which she managed to start up with a lot of effort, patience and sacrifice, she has made enough income to support her.

She works alone every day for 10 hours. Aiming to be the best family business in the area, Sonia wishes to request a loan for the purchase of stock, such as grains and groceries, which will allow her to expand her inventory. This way, she will overcome such difficulties as low sales and competition.

This loan with be a great opportunity to establish herself as the most productive store on the lane.

loans.use: buy stock, such as grains and groceries, which will allow her to expand her inventory.

loans.name: Maria Delmy

texts.es: Maria de 40 años de edad vive sola en casa propia, ella posee una tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia desde hace varios años, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra salir adelante ella quiere mejorar su vivienda remodelando su cuarto de habitación cambiando las puertas y colocando piso cerámico pero como no posee suficiente capital está solicitando un crédito para la compra de los materiales de construcción y pago de mano de obra y así puede tener una mejor vivienda.
texts.en:
Maria, age 40, lives alone in her own house.  She has had a store at her house for several years.  With what she gets from her sales she manages to get ahead.

She wants to improve her house by remodeling her bedroom, changing the doors, and putting down tile flooring.  However, she does not have enough money to do so.  She is requesting a loan to buy construction materials and to pay for labor.  This way she will be able to have a better house.

loans.use: o buy construction materials and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia is taking a loan of $1,500 to improve her business. She is married and she has five children. She is running a rental business that helps her to generate income for her family. 

She will use the loan to buy paper, computers and printers. She opened her rental a year ago with her own working capital of $600. Cecilia is a hardworking woman, and she hopes to run a bigger business in the future. 

Her husband is a teacher.

loans.use: to buy paper, computers and printers

loans.name: Guilhermina

texts.en:
A $600 loan is offered to Guilhermina to improve her business. She has a kiosk where many people come to buy every day. She will buy some additional supplies such as sugar, salt, coffee, cigarettes, biscuits, noodles and rice. 

She has been involving herself in business activities since 2010. She feels so comfortable to run her business because she can earn money every day. Running a business has made Guilhermina independent because she can be responsible for herself and also help her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy sugar, salt, coffee, cigarettes, biscuits, noodles and rice

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase vegetables, dried fish and a few toys

loans.name: Teran Sergio

texts.es:
Sergio es un campesino, humilde y trabajador con el empuje y verraquera que distingue a los hombres y mujeres del campo.

Es un Hombre de mente emprendedora y desde muy pequeño aprendió todos los oficios del campo como cultivos y crianza de animales, tanto así que hoy en día tiene su propio cultivo café; alimentos que vende en la plaza de mercado del municipio de Monteria.
Este personaje tiene como propósito aumentar sus cultivos y mejorar los que actualmente tiene y es por eso que acude a la ayuda de un crédito con la Corporación Interactuar para la compra de insumos agropecuarios como fertilizantes, abonos y la compra de semillas de café.

El préstamo le dará la oportunidad de progresar como empresario y como persona, además de aumentar sus ingresos y seguir aportando el sustento en su hogar.

Él lo único que quiere es poder mejorar la calidad de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en:
Sergio is a hardworking and humble farmer with that spirit and drive that distinguishes men and women from the countryside. He is a man with an entrepreneurial mind, and since he was very little he has learned about all aspects of the farm, like crops and raising animals. As such, today he has his own coffee crops, which he sells at the local market in the municipality of Monteria. 

His goal is to increase his crops and improve the ones he currently has. Because of this, he is requesting the help of a loan from Interactuar in order to purchase agricultural supplies like fertilizers, compost, and coffee seeds. This loan will give him the opportunity to progress as a business owner and as a person, as well as increase his income and continue supporting the needs of his household. The only thing he wants is to be able to improve the quality of life for himself and his family.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies like fertilizer, compost, and coffee seeds.

loans.name: Mirna Cecilia

texts.es: Mirna es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras su negocio está ubicado en el mercado municipal tiene 27 años de dedicarse a esa actividad y con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra salir adelante, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas frutas y verduras por mayor y así poder continuar con sus ventas para tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Mirna is a single mother who lives in her own house with her two children. She works selling fruit and vegetables and her business is located in the municipal market. She has been working in this business for 27 years and with what she makes from her sales she manages to get ahead. She is requesting a loan to buy more fruits and vegetables wholesale and thus be able to continue with her sales in order to enjoy greater economic revenue.

loans.use: to buy more fruit and vegetables wholesale.

loans.name: Shavkatjon

texts.en:
Shavkatjon is a bright boy. He was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in 1995. He is single and lives with parents. He is a second year student at university. He is studying at a full-time department. He tries his best to be in the profession of his major – economist. 

He is well known among students and friends. He is active at classes and enjoys spending time with friends. 

He is applying to IMON and Kiva to get a loan to pay his tuition fee for his studies. He hopes to be supported and graduate from his studies with excellence.

loans.use: to pay his tuition fee for his studies

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
El señor Santos de 53  años de edad, es soltero tiene un hijo que depende de él, posee casa propia y se dedica desde hace 14  años al negocio de venta de frescos,  vende todo lo relacionado a la venta de frescos de todo los tamaños.
Don Santos sus clientes son los dueños de pulpería ya que el vende al por mayor los refrescos también  vende  agua purificada es un hombre soltero que está saliendo adelante con su negocio y gracias al apoyo del los prestamos con Prisma  el está mejorando su calidad de vida.
Don Santos está solicitando  un préstamo para surtir su negocio con la compra de mas refrescos de diferentes sabores como banana, uva, fresa, etc. con el apoyo del mismo el pretende mejorar su negocio porque tendrá más inventario y por ende espera mejorar sus ganancias, está muy contento de seguir trabajando con Prisma. Su sueño es tener un buen depósito de refrescos en la zona.

San Lorenzo, Honduras- Junio del 2015.
texts.en:
Santos is 53 years old. He is single and he has a son that depends on him. He has his own home and has worked for 14 years on his business selling refreshments. He sells all items that are related to selling refreshments of all kinds. Santo's customers are the owners of grocery stores because he sells the refreshments in bulk and he also sells bottled water. He is a single man who is getting ahead with his business and, thanks to the support from the Prisma loans, he is improving his quality of life. Santos is seeking a  loan to supply his business with the purchase of additional different flavored refreshments, such as banana, grape, strawberry, etc. With the support of the loan he aims to improve his business because he will have more inventory and thus he hopes to improve his earnings. He is very content to continue working with Prisma. His dream is to have a good warehouse of refreshments in the local area.  

San Lorenzo, Honduras- June 2015.

loans.use: to purchase banana, grape and strawberry refreshments, etc.

loans.name: Shahnoza

texts.en:
Shahnoza is a capable woman. She was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in 1983. She is married and has two children. 

Her husband is a farmer. He keeps and sells livestock. She is a business woman. She plants agricultural products in her land. For almost ten years she has done business. At the same time she grows and trains her two young children. 

Recently, she has been planning to cultivate her land and plant cereal. She appealed to get a loan from Kiva to buy fertilizer and seeds for cereal. She hopes to be supported and gain enough income to ensure her children are provided for.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds for cereal

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is a Kiva borrower. He has three children. He describes himself to be enterprising. 

He operates a transport business where he transports school children to school for a fee. He has been involved in this business for two years. His business is located in an area with potential and his primary customers are school children. He describes his biggest business challenge to be poor roads. 

He will use the KES 70,000 loan to repair the van. His business goal is to have a fleet of school buses within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will use the business to sustain his family. 

This is his third loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. The previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to repair the van

loans.name: Saumu

texts.en:
Saumu is a married mother of three children, all of whom attend school. She lives in her own house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past seven years, she has operated a business selling clothes, selling from door to door to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of competition in her place of operation. She dreams of expanding and establishing a boutique business in the future. 

With the loan that she is requesting of KES 20,000, she wants to purchase bales of clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bales of clothes for resale

loans.name: Mwanamkasi

texts.en:
Mwanamkasi is married and has three children, two of whom attend school while one is still too young to attend school. She owns a house that has electricity but no piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past four years, she has owned a food stall business for neighbors and town dwellers. She faces a major challenge of competition from other operators.

With the KES 20,000 she wants to purchase stock of goods like sugar, rice, maize and wheat flour, and cooking fat oil. She decided to join Yehu to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of goods like sugar, rice, maize and wheat flour, and cooking fat oil

loans.name: María Francisca

texts.es:
María de 50 años de edad, no pudo asistir a la escuela, su familia era muy numerosa y sus padres no ajustaban a mandarlos a la escuela, ahora  es madre soltera de 5 hijos,  tres de ellos viven aparte y dos viven con ella y se dedican a trabajar en la agricultura.


María se dedica a tejer hamacas y  matatas, lo aprendió desde muy joven y le ha servido para criar a sus hijos con las ganancias, cuando tiene muchos pedidos de los productos sus hijos son quienes le ayudan.


	Ella necesita este crédito para comprar hilo para tejer hamacas y para comprar fertilizantes para su milpa.

Ella sueña con seguir adelante con su trabajo y que sus hijos siempre la valoren por el esfuerzo que hizo para criarlos ella sola.
texts.en: María is 50 years old. She couldn't attend school, her family was very large,  and her parents couldn't afford to send them to school. She is now a single mother with 5 children, 3 of them live independently and two live with her and work in agriculture. Maria works knitting hammocks and mats. She learned it since very young and it has helped her raise her children with her earnings. When she has a lot of orders, her children help her. She needs this loan to buy yarn to knit the hammocks and to buy fertilizers for her vegetable garden. She dreams of getting ahead with her work, and that her children appreciate her efforts to raise them by herself.

loans.use: To buy yarn to to knit hammocks and to buy fertilizers for her small vegetable garden..

loans.name: Norberta

texts.en:
Norberta is taking a loan of $800 to improve her business. She is running a kiosk that helps her to generate income for her family. 

She will use the loan to buy stocks to keep in her store such as  traditional clothes and bread. She opened her kiosk a year ago with her own working capital of $300.  

She is a hard working woman and she hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: To buy traditional clothes and bread

loans.name: Iria

texts.en:
An $800 loan is offered to Iria to improve her business. She has a business where many people come to buy every day. She will buy thread. She has been involving herself in business activities since 2011. She feels so comfortable to run her business because she can earn money every day.

Running a business has made Iria independent because she can be responsible for herself and also help her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy thread

loans.name: Joanita

texts.en:
Joanita is taking a loan of $1,000 to improve her business. She is married and she is running a kiosk that helps her to generate income for her family. 

She will use the loan to buy stock to keep in her store such as biscuits, sugar, coffee, cigarettes and bread.

She opened her kiosk a year ago with her own working capital of $600. She is a hardworking woman, and she hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy biscuits, sugar, coffee, cigarettes and bread

loans.name: Leandro Antonio

texts.es:
Leandro es un hombre campesino de 60 años de edad, trabajador y humilde, que desde niño aprendió a realizar todas las labores del campo, gracias a las enseñanzas de sus padres. 

Esto le ha permitido progresar y, hoy en día posee cultivos de plátano, cultivos que atiende todos los días y las cosechas son vendidas en la plaza de mercado del municipio de Montería, adicionalmente, realiza labores de jornalero en diferentes fincas de la región, pues con ello complementa los ingresos con los que vela por el bienestar de sus padres que tanto lucharon para sacarlo adelante. 

Con el apoyo del crédito solicitado en la Corporación Interactuar, comprará insumos agrícolas al por mayor como abonos, pesticidas, fertilizantes y otros, con esto seguirá cuidando sus cultivos y tendrá una mejor cosecha, más productiva y así mejorará los ingresos a la hora de vender sus productos.

Leandro, con su espíritu emprendedor, su pujanza y tenacidad, quiere seguir luchando para cumplir el sueño de tener una finca propia, en la que pueda cultivar mucha más variedad de productos y así mejorar la rentabilidad del negocio, garantizando una estabilidad económica para su familia.
texts.en:
Leandro is a farmer who is 60 years old, hardworking, and humble. Since he was a child, he learned how to perform all aspects of work on the farm, thanks to the teachings of his parents. This has allowed him to progress, and today he has plantain crops which he tends to every day and sells his harvests at the local market in the municipality of Monteria. He also works as a day laborer at different farms in the area, which complements his income, and allows him to help care for the well-being of his parents, who worked so hard to help him get ahead. 

With the support of the loan that he has requested from Interactuar, he will purchase agricultural supplies in bulk, like compost, pesticides, fertilizers, and others. This will allow him to continue tending to his crops and have a better, more productive harvest, and thus improve his income when it comes time to sell his products. 

Landro, with his entrepreneurial spirit, drive, and tenacity, wants to keep working hard in order to achieve his dream of having his own farm where he can grow a much wider variety of crops and improve the profitability of his business, thus guaranteeing economic stability for his family.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies in bulk, like compost, pesticides, fertilizers, and more.

loans.name: Ana

texts.en: Ana lives in Liquica. She is married and is a businesswoman. She has been doing business since 2014 with her own working capital of USD 1,000. She is requesting a loan of USD 1,000 from Tuba Rai Metin to add to her working capital to buy additional supplies to keep in her store, such as aqua, hand and body soap, shampoo, candy, books, medicines, diapers, biscuits, and other things to sell. She is taking this loan because she wants to make her kiosk bigger in the future.

loans.use: To buy aqua, hand and body soap, shampoo, candy, books, medicines, diapers, biscuits, and other things to sell.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es: Manuel de 46 años de edad  vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos, el se dedica desde hace 29 años a la agricultura siembra maíz y hortalizas, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Manuel is 4 years old and lives in his own house with his wife and 4 children. He has earned a living for 29 years from agriculture, sowing maize and vegetables, he sells his products in the various markets found near his house. 

He is asking for a loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, supplies and pest controls, to improve the land which is shown in the photo, to be able to continue with his work and increase his income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, pest controls etc. to improve his land

loans.name: Sulubu

texts.en:
Sulubu is a married man. He has five children. He describes himself to be positive minded. 

He operates a retail business where he sells rice, cooking oil, flour, and other items. He has been involved in this business for four years. His business is located in a good place and his primary customers are regular. He describes his biggest business challenge to be price fluctuations. 

He will use the KES 50,000 loan to buy more stock of rice, cooking oil, flour, sugar, and other items. His business goal is to have a wholesale business within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will have better living conditions. 

This is his second loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. The previous loan was repaid successfully. He will use the anticipated profits to open another shop for his spouse.

loans.use: buy more stock of rice, cooking oil, flour, sugar, and other items

loans.name: Luis Abraham

texts.es:
Luis tiene 30 años de edad, conviviente con 03 hijos a sus cargo, vive en el Sector Palo blanco, que pertenece al distrito de Pucará, provincia de Jaén, Región Cajamarca, Sierra norte de Perú, es una comunidad dedicada a la ganaderia, agricultura y comercio mayormente.

Luis se dedica a limpieza de motos y mototaxis, hace 08 meses, con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de parte de sus clientes; solicita el préstamos para la compra de herramientas de trabajo, como una bomba a presión, mangueras, entre otros; de esta manera podrá ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes, generando mayores ingresos y por ende podrá mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Luis is 30 years old, and lives with his 3 children that he takes care of. He lives in the Palo Blanco sector, which belongs to Pucara district, Jaen provence, in the Cajamarca region in the northern mountains of Peru. It is a community which mainly lives off of livestock, agriculture, and trade.

Luis has earned a living cleaning motorbikes and taxi bikes for 8 months, he has good personal and working references from his clients.

He is asking lenders to help him with purchasing work tools, such as a pressure pump, and hose amongst other things. From this he will be able to offer a better service to his clients, generating more income which will eventually improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy work tools.

loans.name: Emilia Rosa

texts.es:
Emilia ha sido una ama de casa muy dedicada, siempre pendiente del cuidado de su familia; desde siempre le ha gustado trabajar como comerciante independiente, comenzó a trabajar en su propia salsamentaría, pues es responsable de llevar la carga económica del hogar.

Sus clientes son vecinos, familiares y amigos del sector, trabaja sola todos los días en su negocio y encuentra en su labor la ventaja de poder estar pendiente de su familia, al mismo tiempo que logra ser productiva como comerciante.

Actualmente solicita el crédito para comprar inventario de productos como snacks y bebidas para abastecer su negocio.

Emilia manifiesta que su mayor deseo es poder seguir apoyando económicamente a su familia.
texts.en:
Emilia has been a dedicated housewife, always taking care of her family. She has always enjoyed working as an independent business woman. She began working in her own deli, as she is responsible for the financial affairs of the household.

Her customers are neighbours, family members and friends in the area. She works alone every day in her business and has found that her work gives her the benefit of being the provider for her family. At the same time, she manages to be productive as a businesswoman.

She is currently requesting a loan to buy product inventory like snacks and drinks to stock her business. Emilia states that her greatest desire is to be able to continue supporting her family financially.

loans.use: buy product inventory like snacks and drinks to stock her business.

loans.name: Mkhitar

texts.en:
Mkhitar lives with his beloved wife in Kapan city of the Syunik region. He has a higher education and a specialty of engineering. Now he works at the city TV channel as a dispatcher. Mkhitar is married and has two daughters and a son; all of them are married and live with their families. 

Mkhitar is engaged in gardening. It serves both as a source of income for his family and also his family uses fresh and tasty vegetables from their land. He cultivates potatoes, cucumbers, tomatoes, beans, and garlic, and he also has mulberry and apple trees in his garden. Some part of these goods he manages to sell right from his house. Now Mkhitar asks for this Kiva loan as he must repair the fence of his garden and also the water pipe that waters all his vegetables.

loans.use: to repair the water pipe and fence in his garden

loans.name: Petrona

texts.es:
Petrona a sus 41 años de edad ve su sueño cumplirse, el cual es ser una persona independiente y competitiva en el mercado, gracias a la incursión de la Corporación Interactuar en su vida, pudo lograr este sueño y montó una cría y venta de pollos en un corral de su casa. 

Por lo que hoy solicita un crédito que invertirá en la compra de pollos para la cría y alimento para los mismos. 

Es Madre de 4 hijos a los que sueña poder pagarles una buena educación. 

Petrona como buena madre siempre estará a su lado apoyándolos incondicionalmente, por eso esta tan determinado en triunfar en este nuevo proceso de su vida.
texts.en:
Petrona at 41 years old sees her dreams achieved. That of being an independent person who is competitive in the market. Thanks to the entry of Corporación Interactuar into her life she was able to realize this dream and open her business raising and selling chicken in pens at her house.

For this reason she is requesting a loan today which she will invest in the purchase of chickens to raise and feed for them.

She is the mother of four children who dreams of providing a good education for them. As a good mother Petrona is always with them helping them unconditionally. So she is determined to triumph in this new process in her life.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of chickens to raise and feed for them.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
Elsa is requesting a loan of $700 from Tuba Rai Metin to buy additional supplies to  keep in her store, including soy sauce, sardines, noodles, biscuits, sugar and other things to sell. 

Elsa has a small kiosk but she is very interested in her business. She has been doing business since 2013 with her own working capital of $800, and she hopes with this loan she can open a big store in the future.

loans.use: To buy soy sauce, sardines, noodles, biscuits, sugar, and other things to sell.

loans.name: Narie

texts.en:
Narie is a 59-year-old married woman from Khelvachauri district. She lives with her husband and son. The family is involved in agricultural activities. In particular, they have a plot of agricultural land where they grow fruits and vegetables to sell. Narie is a very hardworking woman and does her best to insure a good harvest. 

She decided to renovate a flat and rent it out. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables her to get a loan and renovate a flat. The rent will be a stable source of income for Narie and she will be able to improve the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to renovate a flat and rent it out i

loans.name: Mariana

texts.en:
Mariana is taking a loan of $1,500 to improve her business. She is running a kiosk that helps her to generate income for her family. 

She will use the loan to buy  flour, oils, and ferment. She opened her kiosk a year ago with her own working capital of $300. 

Mariana is a hard working woman and she hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: To buy flour, oils, and ferment

loans.name: Martha Isabel

texts.es:
Marta con 42 años, radicada en una zona rural del municipio del Monteria, siempre se ha desempeñado en el sector agropecuario al lado de su familia donde aprendió estos menesteres, lleva varios años con su propia cría de pollos para la venta y distribución en varias zonas del su pueblo. 

Sueña con aumentar el número de pollos para criar y solicito a la Corporación un crédito con el que adquirirá varios de estos animales y los insumos para la alimentación de estos, las ganancias obtenidas por el aumento de sus animales serán mucho mayor lo que le permitirá tener un mejor nivel de vida sin tanta dificultad económica.
texts.en:
Marta is 42 years old and is based in a rural zone in the Monteria municipality. She has always working in the agriculture and livestock sector alongside her family, from whom she learnt these tasks. She has been rearing her own chickens for a few years, to sell and give out in various zones of her village. 

She hopes to increase the number of chickens she is raising, and is asking the company for a loan with which she will buy several of these animals, along with the supplies needed to feed them. The earnings from the increase in her number of animals will be a lot bigger, which will allow her to have a better quality of life without too much economic difficulty.

loans.use: to purchase various animals and the supplies to feed them.

loans.name: Najma

texts.en:
Najma is a married woman and has three children, all of whom attend school. She lives at a rental house that has electricity but no piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past 15 years, she has owned a food stall business, where neighbours and town dwellers eat. She faces a major challenge of competition in her place of operation.

With the KES 50,000 loan,  she wants to purchase stock of goods like sugar, rice, maize, and wheat flour and cooking fat oil. She dreams of expanding to a modern café in the business.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of goods like sugar, rice, maize and wheat flour, and cooking oil.

loans.name: Ana

texts.en:
Ana is married and she has two children, and her husband is a driver..

She is running a second hand  that helps her to generate income for her family and is taking a loan of $1000 to improve her business. She will use the loan to buy shirts, trousers, shorts, and long and short sleeve shirts. She opened her  second hand a year ago with her own working capital of $400. 

Ana is a hard working woman and she hopes to run a bigger business in the future. She is happy with this loan because it will improve her living conditions in the future.

loans.use: To buy shirts, trousers, shorts, and long and short sleeve shirts

loans.name: Garegin

texts.en:
Garegin is 24 years old and he lives with his parents and sister in Kapan city of the Syunik region. 

Garegin before also and now again works as a driver and simultaneously he is engaged in agricultural works. He has a plot of land on which he cultivates beans and potato mainly for sale. He also has a nice small orchard and here the harvest of apple, apricot and mulberry is mainly for his family use. 

Garegin also has several bee families and he manages to sell very tasty honey. Garegin sells his land’s potatoes and beans to re-sellers who are his regular buyers. Garegin requests this loan of 700,000 AMD (Armenian drams)  as he needs to settle a water tank in his vegetable garden for watering it, and he also wants to buy potato seedlings and wax papers for his bees as well.

loans.use: to settle a water tank in his vegetable garden for watering it and to buy potato seedlings and wax papers for his bees as well

loans.name: Yenis De Jesus

texts.es:
Yenis es una campesina humilde y trabajadora de 50 años de edad, que desde pequeña aprendió todas las labores del campo, gracias a las enseñanzas de su padre.
Actualmente posee cultivos de plátano, cuyas cosechas son recolectadas y vendidas en el mercado del pueblo donde reside, esto le genera los recursos suficientes para llevar el sustento diario a su hogar y solventar las necesidades básicas de su esposo y 2 hijos.

Se motiva a solicitar el crédito con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de insumos agrícolas al por mayor (abonos, pesticidas, fertilizantes), esto le permitirá seguir cuidando de sus cultivos y mejorar la productividad de la próxima cosecha, lo que beneficiará los ingresos que percibe por cada venta.

Yenis manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es seguir luchando para generar una estabilidad económica y brindar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida y bienestar.

El cultivo de Yenis Podrá mantenerse y salir adelante con tu ayuda!
texts.en:
Yenis is a humble peasant and worker who is 50 years old. At a young age, she learned all of the workings of the field, thanks to her father's teachings. 

Currently, she has plantain crops, whose harvests are collected and sold in the market in the town where she lives. This generates sufficient resources for daily sustenance in her home, and to meet the basic needs of her husband and 2 children.

She is motivated to ask for a loan with in order to invest in in the purchase of wholesale agricultural supplies (manure, pesticides, fertilizers). This will allow her to continue to care of her crops and improve the productivity of her next harvest. This will benefit her earnings in each sale.

Yenis says that her greatest wish is to continue to fight to generate economic stability and to offer her family better living conditions and well-being.

Yenis' crops can be maintained and succeed with your help!

loans.use: for the purchase of wholesale agricultural supplies (manure, pesticides, fertilizers)

loans.name: Bidallah

texts.en:
Bidallah is a married woman and has five children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past five years, she has owned a food stall business, selling to neighbors and town dwellers. She faces a major challenge of competition in her business from other operators.

With the KES 20,000 she wants to purchase stock of goods like sugar, rice, maize and wheat flour, and cooking fat oil. She decided to join Yehu to access loans and boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of goods like sugar, rice, maize and wheat flour, and cooking fat oil

loans.name: José Marcial

texts.es:
José de 22 años de edad, es un joven dedicado a las labores de la agricultura, actualmente está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a la elaboración de petates y oficios domésticos, juntos tienen un bebé de 9 meses de edad por el cual deben esforzarse para poder criarlo.

José se dedica a la agricultura, esto lo aprendió desde pequeño por sus padres, además es la mayor fuente de ingresos en la zona donde él vive.

José solicita este crédito para comprar insumos para la elaboración y venta de helados, ya que es un nuevo negocio que ha decidido implementar con la idea de obtener más ingresos económicos.

Su mayor sueño es sacar adelante este negocio, que sea rentable y le sirva para sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
José is 22 years old and works in agriculture. He is in a relationship and his partner works making woven bags and doing domestic work. They have a 9 month old baby together and they have to work hard to raise it.

José works in agriculture which he learned from his parents when he was small. It is the main source of income in the area where he lives.

José is requesting a loan to buy supplies to make and sell ice-cream as a new business he has decided to start with the idea of making more economic revenue.

His main dream is to get ahead with this business, that it is profitable and helps him to get ahead with his family.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make and sell ice-cream as a new business he has decided to start.

loans.name: Delfina

texts.en:
Delfina is requesting a loan of $800 to improve her business. Delfina has been involved in business activities since she started with her own working capital of $ 800 in 2010.  

Her life is selling gasoline every day because she earns a good income from this business. She lives near the main road and every day many people come to buy her gasoline so she is still happy to do her business. She is taking this loan to buy more gasoline.

loans.use: To buy gasoline.

loans.name: Charlene

texts.en:
Charlene is a 36-year-old married woman with four children, three of whom are currently in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Charlene has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Charlene has been in this business for 15 years.
